1.content:
How about some options?

Robin: Eighteen years old with strong feminist views,she bulks up to teach her overly macho boyfriend that women can be as big and strong as him.

Olive: A scrawny sixteen year old who never liked vegetables. When bullies start giving her trouble,she learns the value of a can of spinach.
Sandra: A thity-eight year old housewife who wishes to become a FBB in spite of her domineering husband.
Monica: A loving twenty-five year old single mother, when her eight year old son is bullied by a jock a jock as well as his FBB mom,she challenges the FBB to a growing contest and several other athletic competiitions.
1.title: Choices!

choices: Robin keeps lifting and has miraculous growth.
Robin leaves for school and swears to return bigger than him.
Jake demeans as "Strong for a girl."
11.content:
School had just ended and summer was upon them. Unlike previous summers, at the end of this one Robin would be leaving her podunk, redneck, backwoods, red state for somewhere a little more forward thinking. She would be going to UCLA and couldn't wait to find herself in modern society.

For now though, she was sitting in her boyfriend Jake's garage watching him pump iron while getting a head start on her Women's Studies textbook.

She and Jake didn't have much in common, he was pretty bullheaded and just as backwards as this whole town. She stayed with him, at least for the rest of the summer, because the man was built like a god. At 6'4" and 240 of marble statue, he had begun to receive interest from colleges for football, but they quickly backed off when they saw his academic transcript.

Yes, it was shallow, but men objectified women all the time. Why shouldn't she even the score a little bit? Anyway, she knew he was only with her for her looks as well. Even though she never dressed the part, Robin was stunning. She was 5'10" of red-headed, DD-chested, supermodel quality beauty. She kept it all wrapped up, however, in glasses, baggy hoodies, and loose jeans.

With a grunt and a clang, Jake racked a bench press heavy enough to bend the bar at the edges. The noise got Robin's attention enough to peek over her book. "Damn, he's... mmmm." Robin muttered to herself.

"I see you over there pretending to read." Jake says smiling. "You know, I don't mind if you stare. You don't have to hide it."

"I wasn't watching you." Robin half lies with a chuckle.

"Hmm. Sure. You weren't looking at this?" He started flexing. Going smoothly from one pose to another.

"Nope. I'm preparing to do important things." She gestured to her book, "To be something special; do something not just anyone could do."

"Pfft. That? What's the big deal about this Chick's Studies stuff anyway? It seems like a waste of time."

"What? And lifting heavy things isn't?!"

"Not just anyone can build a body like this." He gets back into flexing trying to lighten the mood, but Robin will have none of it.

"HA! Sure they can."

"Not anyone. You couldn't. Everyone knows that real muscle and strength are not for girls." Robin just stared at him angrily. "I mean, if you loaded up on steroids, then maybe you'd get kinda buff. But not like this. Plus, muscles are ugly on a chick."

Robin stood up and walked silently across the room toward the dumbbells, taking her hoodie off along the way revealing her prodigious breasts stuffed into a wifebeater with no bra. She quickly put her hair into a ponytail and reached for a pair of weights that looked heavy to her grabbing the 25s.

"Hey. slow down now. Don't hurt yourself. That's really heavy for a girl."

For a girl. FOR A GIRL. That phrase was amongst the worst anyone could utter to her and her fire was lit. She turned to Jake and stared him dead in the eye. When he took a step towards her she started curling the weights. Actually, it looked surprisingly easy and stopped Jake in his tracks. After ten reps, she dropped them where she stood and pulled up a double bicep flex. She had more muscle than either of them realized, but it was still far from Jake's superhuman mass.
11.title: Robin

111.content:
Robin smirked momentarily as she glanced at the muscles bulging beneath her flawless skin. Little lemon sized biceps were flexing up where nothing had been before she curled those weights. Robin paused to soak that thought in.

“Where nothing had been before….”

Surely she must have had some muscle hidden there previously. She couldn’t have grown these muscles that quickly just by curling those weights. And those weights…. She wasn’t an expert in weight lifting, but knew quite a bit from hanging with Jake. Curling 25 pounds was a pretty impressive feat for a teen-age girl, as much as she would hate to admit the ‘for a girl’ part. And the weights felt a bit heavy when she lifted them up, then they went from being manageable as she worked through them toward feeling rather light at the last rep. Robin nodded her head slightly as that thought sunk in as well.

“Rather light at the last rep…..”

Releasing her flex, Robin placed her hands on her thin waist and pushed out one hip. “Real heavy, huh?”

Jake shook his head. “Yeah, for a girl. And those little muscles are cute and all, but unless you want to look like a guy, you’ve already got enough muscle.”

Robin frowned. “For a girl, huh? Well maybe I haven’t finished showing you just what this girl can lift.”

Jake spat out a sarcastic chuckle. “Yeah, whatever. Although your chest is pretty big, that’s not going to help you lift bigger weights.”

Robin glanced down at her chest, realizing that her outfit was showcasing her curves and her prodigious chest. She considered running to put her hoodie back on, but eyed some heavier weights and decided to see if her last lift and muscle flex was really just a one-time thing.

“Oh yeah, well maybe I was just warming up.”

Jake laughed. “A warm-up? For what?”

Robin moved over toward his rack of weights and reached out to the 50’s. If she could lift these, she surmised, maybe there was something to her ability to grow bigger and stronger. If she couldn’t, well no harm done for now. As she reached out and gripped the metal, Robin turned to look at Jake, whose broad smile changed to a more curious look. Smiling at the thought of stunning him, she tugged at the weights and was once again surprised that she was able to pull them off the rack and bring them to her sides so easily. Turning, she licked her lips as she felt the heft of the weights move from really heavy to manageable in moments. Oh, this could wind up being a really good day!

“A warm-up for bigger things.”

Keeping her eyes on Jake to watch his expression, Robin pulled the first weight up with her right arm, showing as little strain as possible, completing the curl smoother than Jake would have thought any girl could. Jake’s surprised look caused Robin to chuckle.

“Maybe it’s just time to show you what girls are really capable of…”

Robin cranked out the repetitions smoothly, enjoying both the feeling of strength and the confused look on Jake’s face. After 10 curls with each arm, Robin turned and placed the weights back on the rack with a loud ‘clank’. She then pulled her arms back up into a double bicep pose and smiled as she felt her muscles expand as she flexed down. Turning to look at her progress she let out a quick laugh. Her biceps had grown bigger! Each arm was now sporting biceps the size of baseballs on her long arms and they looked, well, amazing!

“Like I said, bigger things!”

Releasing her flex, she cocked her head and looked down. Her baggy shorts hung just below her knees and she had on sandals. Not really work-out gear, but now she wanted to make a point. Jake wasn’t feeling the same way.

“Well that was impressive I guess for a girl and all, but I think it’s time for you to get back to your book.”

Robin sniffed. “No, I think it’s time to give this body the work-out it deserves. Come on tough guy, let’s go through a routine. I want to see how much I can lift. And as she thought to herself as she glanced at her arms “and how much these muscles can grow.”

Walking up to her unwilling partner, Robin leaned against his shoulder and gave his large arm a squeeze. “I can do this with or without you.”

Jake shook his head, still not liking the idea, but as a minimum not wanting her to get hurt. So with curious reluctance he followed Robin around as she lifted more than he thought a girl would be capable of, certainly not in his league, but stronger than most guys their age, which was a bit disconcerting. If Robin still wasn’t so beautiful with those big breasts, he might have asked her to stop. Robin, however, was loving every second of her work-out. Her squats caused her thin legs to quickly bulge with larger quads and she even stood on her toes as she stood up from each lift, adding mass to her calves as well. Bench pressing 175 pounds was great and she could feel pectorals expand and push her prodigious cleavage even further, causing Jake’s eyes to widen as he stared down. The lat pull-down pushed her back out wider while inverted crunches bulled out a solid six pack along her narrow abs, barely hidden by the ever tightening wife-beater. As she finished up with shoulder raises, she dropped the weights and turned to look at Jake.

“Now that was rather enjoyable. Bet you never thought this girl was this strong.”

Jake took a step back, trying to take all of Robin’s seemingly new body in. It really was as if she was transforming as she lifted. And he really didn’t think Robin was that strong, but was still unwilling to admit it.

“Well, yeah, you lifted some pretty good weights and all, and your body is, well, bigger than I thought. So you’re guess, you know, for a girl and all, stronger than most.”

Robin narrowed her eyes as her smiled dropped. “For a GIRL, huh?”

Robin placed her hands on her hips and flexed her muscles, causing them to press against her top and flex beneath her loose shorts. Her lats pressed out impressively and muscles bulged across her body big enough to compare to the biggest cross fit woman or fitness girl. And considering she was super model gorgeous and 5 foot 10, she looked like an Amazon from a late night movie.

Jake stared down at Robin with a mix of lust, confusion and disgust. She was still beautiful and her breasts pressed out tight against her white top, but the added muscle was off-putting. So trying to brush off her gains and impressive lifts, Jake scoffed.

“Yeah, like I said; for a GIRL! Now are we done with this, because maybe it’s time to move on to something different.”

Robin dropped her arms to the side and held her disapproving stare. She knew that look and right now she definitely didn’t feel the same way. She felt incredible, like she could keep lifting and maybe, just maybe, keep growing. On the other hand, she felt that she had proven her point for now, even if Jake still couldn’t see it.

Robin let out a sigh. “Well, Jake…”
111.title: Robin keeps lifting and has miraculous growth.

choices: Time to work out the rest of my body
Let me flex down a bit harder
Admit girls are strong as boys
1111.content:
Robin let a low growl rumble in her throat. “You know Jake; I think I’m ready to show you what this GIRL can do. I’m not done lifting. In fact, let’s do some of those lifts again together using your heaviest weights.”

Robin’s comments knocked Jake out his lust filled thoughts. “What? You’re not making any sense. You can’t possibly lift what I can.”

Robin smiled, happy she had knocked him off balance. “Well if I can’t, then we can stop.”

Jake nodded his head. “Good. This should be quick. What did you want to watch me lift, seeing as I’m the only one who will be able to.”

Robin bit her lower lip. She really was worried she had bitten off more than she could chew. And if Jake showed off and she couldn’t move his weight, well, she figured he would be all over her. Sighing at the realization, Robin looked over at her arms. It was the first thing she tried and she hoped would be that lift that would drive her forward.

“Let’s uh, go back to the alternating curls.”

Jake snorted. “Fine. I’ve got the strongest arms around, maybe for anyone. Let me put together the bars.”

Robin tried not to gulp. This was lining up to be a quick challenge. She watched with building worry as Jake piled on weights to each bar until she could see 220 pounds of weights were lined up on the 10 pound bars. Jake confirmed her count.

“Ha! This is my best. 230 pounds with each arm. Let’s DO this!”

Jake bent down and picked up the massive weights, staring forward as he pumped himself up. His upper body seemed to surge a bit and the veins along his arms rose up. Robin stared on with wide eyes as Jake took several hard breaths and then leaning forward a bit, Jake yelled out as he powered up his right arm, leaning back a bit with final scream as he completed the curl! He allowed it to go down slowly, paused as he caught his breath and then repeated the incredible feat with his left arm. He paused again and squatted down to drop the weights to the mat with two loud thuds. Jake’s face was red from the effort and sweat was rolling down his cheek. He shook his head and smiled with arrogance.

“Now that’s what a real MAN can do! You can try both arms with one of the weights if you want. No way could you match that!”

Jake pulled up his arms and flexed up an incredible double bicep, tensing his huge muscles to over 25 inches in girth. “And no way can you flex up this much muscle!”

Robin grit her teeth, trying not to admire both the feat and his huge muscles. Damn it, now she had only given him fodder for his argument. Unwilling to at least not try, Robin walked up to take her position as Jake backed up and toweled himself off, holding as much confidence as she could. Perhaps if she had worked herself up this weight. “Yeah,” she thought, “worked up to it for like 5 years.” As she looked down, she realized that this was nearly five times what she had lifted. What had she gotten herself into? Setting her feet, Robin did her best to match Jake’s intensity.

“We’ll see. There’s more to this girl than you realize.”

Jake smirked and leaned against the bench press rack. “You won’t even be able to lift those. Why don’t you just give up now? Girls don’t belong in gyms anyway.”

Robin grunted. Jake had hit the nerve again. Girls don’t belong, huh? Shooting Jake a death glance, Robin squatted down, curled her long feminine fingers around each steel bar and with a loud, girlish grunt stood up. Robin tried to hold back the tears of pain she was feeling. Her shoulders felt ready to rip out of their sockets, but Robin somehow held her focus, thinking ‘for a girl, for a girl’. And somehow, each breath brought more strength into her body, steadying her stance and solidifying her shaking arms. The lightning bolts of pain diminished, her arms shot out more veins than Jake, and her upper body looked alive as worm like muscle fibers were building up across her upper body, adding more size to her forearms, triceps, biceps, shoulders, traps and chest. Jake’s expression changed from confidence to wonder toward disbelief. Was Robin doing a mini-Hulk out? How was this possible?

Robin let out one more exhale and gathered herself. Smiling through what was still a considerable effort, she knew something was up. Somehow she was growing stronger and a quick glance down at her right arm indicated her muscles were growing bigger as well. With a small smile forming on her ruby lips, Robin swayed her hips back and forth a few times as her strength continued to build. Slowing her hip swivel, she set herself as the growth in her arms slowed down momentarily. Had she now build up enough muscle to prepare herself to actually curl these weights? Nodding her head at what was moments ago an impossible thought, Robin looked over at the right weight, pulled in a few breaths and yanked against the weight with all of her might. The weight, once hanging on her hand for dear life, moved. Not a lot, but enough to indicate she was attempting a curl. The bar rose several inches before Robin let go and steadied herself. Jake was shaking his head.

“Look Robin, just lifting those weights was quite impressive and all, but you’re really going to just rip something if you keep trying to curl those weights. It’s not going to happen.”

Robin breathed in out with renewed ferocity. “Oh yeah? Because I’m just a girl?”

Robin grunted lightly as she attempted to curl the weight again, this time bringing the weight even higher before having to let it go and allow the bar to head back down.

“Haven’t you been paying attention? Just look at my arms now. They’re practically bursting with massive GIRL muscles.”

Robin let out another breath and pulled against the bar for a third time, and as the bar hovered near her shoulder, her muscles bulged even bigger! Releasing her breath, she allowed the bar to head back down slowly.

“And I’m getting stronger Jake. Stronger and stronger! Strong enough to do THIS!”

And to Jake’s building horror, Robin stared at the bar for a moment, took in a few breaths and heaved the bar up. And up. And up! The weight moved higher, clearing her shoulder as her forearm bent toward her now cantaloupe sized mound of muscle bulging from her bicep! She had done it! She had matched Jake’s lift! She had matched Jake’s strength! And looking at her mighty bicep she smiled. She had matched Jake’s size! Allowing her breath to slow, Robin slowed the weight to back down. Paused for a moment before looking over at the shocked Jake, Robin pulled her left arm upward. Jake’s pained expression only turned worse as the weight in her left arm rose up slowly to match the lift from her right arm. Robin huffed as she completed the curl with her left arm! Allowing the weight to move back down Robin stood there for a moment to let her incredible feat sink in.

“So you were able to eke out one curl with each arm before giving up. You looked like your head would explode. But here I am, a mere girl, matching what is likely near a world record lift and I haven’t let go. In fact I’m feeling mighty strong right now. Time to show you what some real strength is, you know, for a GIRL!”

With a smirk on her beautiful face, Robin pulled up her right arm again, completing a second incredible curl, followed quickly with her left. Without a pause Robin began working out with the massive weights as easily as she had lifted the 25 pound weights less than a half hour before! Jake was aghast. How was this possible! After 10 strict power packed reps, Robin smiled at Jake and dropped the weights with twin ground shaking thuds.

“So Jake, still think I’m just pretty strong for a girl?”

Pulling up her arms for the white faced Jake, Robin pulled into a double bicep pose and squeezing her small fists, flexed down, building her biceps into twin balls of incredible density and size. Each bicep peak rose upward, building muscles on top of muscles until her mighty biceps matched the incredible size of her boyfriend, looking even harder and more defined on her thinner frame. And larger too, considering he was a good 6 inches taller!

“And pretty big too, huh?” Robin chortled as she tilted her head to get a look at each bicep. “As big as yours now I guess.”

Staring back at the disbelieving Jake, Robin narrowed her eyes and smiled evilly and with a commanding voice stated.
1111.title: I want to keep lifting

choices: Robin puts Jake in his place
Robin isn't the only person who grew
Jake is happy to see her
112.content:
After her display Robin stormed out and never looked back. She had had enough of his misogyny. She wouldn't so much as read a text from Jake, let alone speak to him. In a few weeks she was off to California and left him behind.

Now, a year later, Summer had come again and brought Robin home with it. A very changed Robin. She quickly found out that most women (or even men for that matter) that had never lifted before weren't capable of easily curling 25 lbs for full sets. Nor could most untrained women (or, once again, even men) flex up 14" toned biceps. Robin had never known that she was a natural for weightlifting/bodybuilding and in less than a year she had put that potential to good use.

After she learned of her affinity for strength, the urge to show Jake what being strong "for a girl" really meant drove her to focus on honing and growing her physique over all other goals, including her schoolwork. It consumed her. Instead of studying for class, she would study nutrition, supplements, and the latest workout methods to enhance her form. Like most students, she gained the freshman 15. The only difference was that hers was all muscle and she gained it in the first month. So unreal was her muscle building ability that she gained 15 lbs of muscle every month she was away, bringing her to an enormous 260 lbs of muscular curves.

She had lost some of her traditional beauty, but she was still undeniably feminine. Her breasts were generous to begin with, so when she just lost a cup size to her shredded muscularity, her chest was still plenty impressive. Her waist had added some inches as her abs strengthened and grew, but not as many inches as she had added to her shoulders, lats, glutes, and thighs. This took her previous hourglass form from incredible to inhuman. Not to mention her impossibly gorgeous face still sat upon her now much larger shoulders. She knew that she was now 20 lbs heavier than Jake was when he demeaned her and all of female-kind, only packed into a body 6 inches shorter.

Now was her moment of absolution. Her year-long mission was about to come to a head. Tree trunk legs carried the 19 year old titaness up the steps to Jake's front door. The creaking boards under her every step brought her a small bit of satisfaction. Raising her feminine hand with her massive arm, she knocked powerfully, but not too much so on the door.
112.title: Robin leaves for school and swears to return

choices: Robin goes away to UCLA, starts to work out and slowly builds herself up
Robin goes away to UCLA and meets a scientist who helps her with her goals
Robin goes away to UCLA and finds ways to grow with magic
113.content:
Robin just smiled at him, proud of her development, wanting him to be proud of her too. And then he said it. The comment that would change their relationship.

"Whoa, you're pretty strong for a girl. You better stay away from the weights, you don't want to get all freaky. No guy wants a woman with bulging biceps. But," his eyes moved from her biceps down to her breasts, staring, almost hypnotized by the way they swayed slightly as she breathed.

"You're bulging real nice other places though. You should let those girls out to breathe more often."

She gave him a distasteful look, and dodged backward from his clumsy attempt to grope her. Like she didn't see that coming a mile away.

"Finish your workout, meathead." she called to him with a half-smile as she danced back to her hoodie, and pulled it over her head, ending the show.

She had a hard time focusing on her studies at that point. She watched him work out even more closely, not as much to admire his impressive physique, but to imagine what it must feel like. Her arms tingled from their exertion and she had to admit lifting those weights felt exhilarating to her.

She found herself on her ipad googling things like how to build muscle as a woman. Articles came up, and pictures that were amazing. Powerful, ripped, muscular women, some who could even be considered massive. Other worldly pictures of women with rippling physiques she couldn't have imagined. Her searches got more and more involved. Muscular woman, bodybuilders, strong women, Gigantic muscle women dominating men, beating them wrestling, forcing them to submit to their powerful muscle. She was getting hot. Jake may as well have not been in the room, she was getting turned on by what she was seeing on the screen. What would it feel like to be that muscular, that powerful? To be able to make a man, even a man as big and strong as Jake submit? To bend him, twist him, dominate him completely with her massive muscles? Wasn't that the ultimate in women's liberation? To be stronger than the strongest man?

She wanted this, she NEEDED this. To build up her body to inhuman size, hardness and definition. To dominate Jake, to show him that strong for a girl was a whole lot stronger than he could comprehend.

She needed something else right now though. She put the tablet down and walked over to Jake. He was doing crunches on a mat, she knelt over him and violently pushed him down on his back. She knew she wasn't strong enough to push him over, but he wasn't about to resist what he knew was coming as his sexy girlfriend took him on the yoga mat. She imagined the whole time how this was going to go very differently the next time they met.
113.title: Jake demeans as "Strong for a girl."

choices: Robin starts the program right away
Robin is not physically fit enough and is given 2 weeks to get in shape
1132.content:
As she started school at UCLA that fall Robin quickly fell in love with learning. While she initially wanted to get her degree in gender studies she quickly realized that despite having some grants and scholarships that since it did not cover 100% of her learning she should major in something she could get a job in. Besides for electives she could any course she wanted she reasoned. She decided to get a double major in sports science/nutrition, and in human biology. While Robin loved going to class, she loved the beach, and being away from home her upbringing in a small town in the middle of nowhere meant she had a hard time making friends because she was very shy. Hell some of her classes had more students than her entire K-12 school district back home. What this meant though was she had plenty of time to study and more importantly plenty of time to take advantage of the campus gym closest to where she lived. In just over 5 weeks she had made some serious progress but with money being tight she did not have the funds to get serious about taking supplements. One Saturday night though she was on the leg press all alone in the gym when a few men came in and one stapled a form on to the announcement wall. 2 of the men she recognized as her professors but the other 2 she had no clue who they were. One she guessed was military by his haircut a nice high and tight and the way he carried himself but had no clue about the other one. As they turned to leave the mostly empty gym Robin finished the last rep of the last set and went over to see what the announcement was for after wiping down the machine.

She read the announcement to herself "Volunteer wanted for experimental exercise and eating program." She wondered "Why would a biology professor care about a weight lifting program? I can understand one of my sports science instructor. Hell all we do is design different workout routines." Robin took the announcement down and read some of the details. An off campus apartment a nice living stipend, and free access to a gym were a plus even if she already had the last one. Still giving up Friday and Saturday night would suck for most people she thought. Not her though as she really did not have a social life. She took the announcement down folded it up and as she went to the female locker room she put it in her purse. As she was walking back to her apartment an epiphany went off in her mind and she decided to go to every other billboard announcement on campus and pull the same announcement down. With that done she went back to her apartment changed out of her sweaty workout clothes, hopped in and out of the shower and went to bed. Robin had a phone call to make in the morning. She had lots of questions but figured those would get answered in due time as she went to sleep. When she woke up in the morning she took her morning run of 4 miles, came back poured a glass of orange juice and grabbed the folded up announcement out of her purse. She was surprised that somebody answered at 7 in the morning as most stores were not open yet. Still she took down the notes to be at a certain address tomorrow at 0930 in formal clothes for an interview and to bring some workout clothes along.
1132.title: guinea pig for science

choices: when she starts the program she meets the programs goals
she blows the program goals out of the water
11321.content:
The next morning Robin went to an office complex and walked in to office #2756 Suite B. She had a 1 piece swimsuit, a bottle of water, some workout clothes and a protein bar as she was requested. She had was wearing a nice conservative blue dress. She waited outside in a waiting lobby for only 15 minutes before a door opened and one of her professors came in. "Robin how are you this morning?" Robin looked up at a man she knew only as Mr. Smith and said "Nervous but anxious." He smiled at her and with that he waived her to the back. She was led to a conference room. There was a lone office chair sitting in the middle of the room facing seven chairs looking back. They all had people sitting in them. 2 were wearing lab coats, 2 were wearing khakis with a polo shirt, 2 dressed in very expensive business suits, and the final man was dressed in a crisp military uniform.

She sat down and one of the men dressed in a suit addressed her "Thank you Robin for showing interest in the human enhancement Research (HER) project. You already know 2 of the people on this panel so let me introduce the rest." As he started with names the military officer chimed in and said "I will be frank with you Miss Robin, combat loads for troops are getting heavier and the traditional PT program the military uses is not helping. We looked at various options to include steroids for troops but it was your professor's research that caught are eye. Hence why we wanted a UCLA student buy for some reason you were the only one to respond to our flyer." Robin let a smile and thought to herself with an inner chuckle "I wonder why that was," as she thought back to taking down every announcement that was posted. Finally the other man in wearing a suit said "Do you have any questions?"

Robin thought for a second and the room was silent. Finally she asked why not get an athlete especially a football player?" One of the men wearing a polo shirt smiled and said "This project is classified. If an athletes performance improved quickly the NCAA would investigate? She asked some more questions and all were answered. Finally she was led out back out to the lobby to grab her bag and led to a bathroom. "Do you have some swimwear you want to change in to?" Robin looked at the man and said "If I don't then what?" He smiled and let out a little laugh and then turned serious as he looked at her and responded "Well if you want to go in further in project HER then you would strip down to your bra and panties." With that he left her so Robin could enter the bathroom to change in to her bathing suit. When she was done she was taken to get her measurements. "5'10", 110 LBS, DD sized breasts, 18 years old" one of the men in a lab coat said as he wrote her measurements down. With that she was led back the bathroom to change in to her workout gear. As soon as she was finished she was led outside and put in the back seat of a black SUV and driven to an athletic training center where she was put through an initial athletic PT session. When she was done she was sweating big time. After drinking some water and being given a chance to shower she was given some brand new clothes. She looked at the label and gasped as they were way more expensive than anything she had ever worn and they had got her size just right. When she was changed she was escorted back to the black SUV and driven back to the office and led back to the conference room.

She sat back in the same chair and the same men entered. This time the military officer spoke and said "Congrats Robin, and God speed to accomplishing the mission." She looked at him and before she could speak he continued "You are perfect miss. You are a 6 hour flight from being home, you are a loner, no offense, you seem smart, your performance on the physical test was acceptable." With that he handed her a set of truck keys to a Ford F-150 and a penthouse key. "From this time forward all of your classes are online as I want you to go to school if you wish. Here is your new vehicle." He then grabbed her a business card with an address on it, passed it to her and said "Here is your new apartment I trust you will be OK with it." With that she was told to she could leave but she had 3 hours to be moved.

When she finished packing up her stuff and left her dorm room she proceeded straight to a nice high rise condominium. She was on the top floor with a view overlooking the city. When she walked in she stunned. Her penthouse had 3 bedrooms 2 master bedrooms, one converted in to a first rate gym. The smaller bedroom was an office with a state of the computer, printer, and other technology. The kitchen was state of the art, with 2 refrigerators, and the living room was a perfect place to relax complete with an 80" TV. When she walked in to the kitchen there was a note on one of the counter that read "You have one week to relax here. May I suggest you take advantage of your gym you are going to need it. Also we do not care what you are eat but you must drink one of the blue vials twice a day. Do not ask what is in as that is classified at the highest levels." With that Robin went over to the sofa laid down and turned on the TV. "One week she thought to herself. She looked at the time and the clock read 2100. With that she went to bed so she could wake up in the morning and begin kicking her workout routine in to overdrive.
11321.title: Robin starts the program right away

choices: Robin realizes The Amulet is altering reality to her wishes.
1133.content:
The last six months had been the best of her life. Robin had this realization as she jogged to the gym on a beautiful Los Angeles day. She had dumped that dumbass jake and used him to motivate herself towards a better life. This summer she dedicated herself to exercise and immediately lost 15 lbs. She already looked like a supermodel and now she had the beginnings of a six pack to boot. The weight left her in all of the right places, too. None seemed to disappear from her chest or butt. She followed up her impressive loss with a gain of 25 lbs of perfect muscle. She was now 150 lbs of ripped goddess.

She smiled as she ran down the sidewalk, her sports bra barely containing her eye popping breasts, while completely revealing her sculpted abs. Every time she got a stare she wanted to shame herself for playing to society's expectation of a woman to be sexy, but couldn't help but be excited about revolutionizing her body. Lost in thought about her own beauty, Robin had stopped paying attention to where she was going. She didn't know what happened, but something slipped out from beneath her foot and she slid, rolling her ankle hard on her way to the ground.

The pain was excruciating and it took her several minutes to open her eyes to see what had caused her fall. She had stepped on an amulet with an unusually long gold chain. She wasn't sure it was an attractive piece of jewelry, but it certainly looked expensive. She hobbled over to it and picked it up, putting it on for safe keeping. She would have to find something to do with this later. She continued to limp to the gym, it was arm day anyway, she could handle the sprained ankle.

"Wow, This is a pain in the ass." She mumbled to herself, just a block away from Biggie's Gym. "I certainly wish that never happened." She said realizing it was obvious.

Suddenly she found herself jogging again. Her ankle didn't just feel healed, it felt like it had never been injured. Her first thought was, "Huh, I guess it wasn't that bad after all." But she was smarter than that. She new that pain. She couldn't explain it, though.

She walked into Biggie's putting the event behind her. She was ready to get pumped. She had found in the past few months that nothing exhilarated her more than building her body. She saw it as the embodiment of her feminist views, wanting to prove that she could do anything she wanted to as a woman. To show that a woman could make big gains as fast, or as she hoped faster, than any man.

She made her way through the large gym to the free weights in the back. It never ceased to amaze her how impressive this place was. She intentionally chose the most hardcore meat market in the area. It was packed with people that would make Jake look as weak as he had tried to make her feel.

Not all of them were men, either. She had found a role model of sorts here. A physical goal would really be a better description. A woman named Valentina called this place her home and seemed to rule it. Robin saw the Eastern European blonde now, standing in front of the mirrors where she was heading. She had her hands on her hips flaring her lats to inhuman proportions. Valentina dropped her jacket to the floor leaving herself in just a sports bra and flexed 19-inch guns that would have made Jake eat his words.

Except for one part. The reason that Robin could not bring herself to call this jacked lady her role model was the steroids. She showed all of the signs. Her muscular growth had been extremely rapid, she had obvious acne on her back and shoulders, and her voice and face were becoming increasingly masculine. Just as Jake said, she only got here by loading up on steroids. Robin swore she would do it her way, the right way, the CLEAN way. If she cheated by injecting male hormones, it would defeat the purpose.

She made her way to the dumbbells and pushed all thought of the Queen of the Gym out of her mind. This was her time. She rarely even listened to music in the gym, preferring to get lost in her own thoughts. She began to warm up her biceps with the 25's, smiling thinking that she was impressed by lifting these a few months ago. After just a few reps she moved down to the 35's, which gave her a feeling of resistance, though not a true challenge. She wanted a challenge today. Instead of just going to the 40's as she normally would for her last set, Robin moved down to the 50's. She wasn't sure she could even complete a single rep with good form, but she had to try.

From day one, Robin had been stronger than she looked. Today was no different. Robin closed her eyes and curled 50 lbs in each arm for the first time. Her form was immaculate, having no sway and hardly any arch to her back. For the second rep she looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire her 14-inch ripped arms. She began to smile as she completed the second and continued into a third rep. This time, however she had to throw her back into the lift. She was impressed but a set for her was usually 8 to 10 reps.

"Damn, I wish I could complete this whole set." she grunted as she lowered her third curl. The next movement was smooth. The jerkiness of the last rep was gone and she was able to get to eight with flawless form before calling it quits. The 50's didn't feel any lighter, she was just suddenly handling it. She dropped the weights and brought up a bicep flex that dropped her own jaw. Her arms were noticeably bigger than when she walked in and she could begin to see a vein on her sharp peak.

She turned to the girl next to her, a cute brunette with impressive arms of her own doing preacher curls. "I can't believe I just curled 50's. Did you see that?"

The girl, who she had never met, laughed and responded. "Um, yeah. It's arm day, right, Robin? I've seen you do that for weeks."
1133.title: The Magic Amulet

choices: Carefully. Can't change the world too drastically.
Carelessly.  She can have whatever she wants.
11331.content:
"You have?" Robin responded, surprised.

"Uh. Yeaaaaah. We've been lifting together for, what, two months now? I've been starting to wonder why you hadn't moved on tho heavier weight. I just assumed you didn't want to get any more jacked."

Robin flexed her arm in the mirror again and took a good look. Her arms were noticeably bigger and more defined, but she was positive that she wasn't big enough to show up Jake yet. It was in the mirror that she again saw, and remembered, the mysterious amulet from earlier. Could it have had something to do with all of this strangeness. Absentmindedly she stroked a finger across its bronze surface and secrets were instantly revealed. It was an odd feeling. One that she could not exactly describe as she had never felt anything like it before in her life. It was as if someone had opened a book in her mind and it contained her new past.

Suddenly she knew that 50 lb curls were nothing crazy for her anymore and hadn't been for two weeks.

She knew that the girl speaking to her was Renee and they had met when the girl had joined Biggie's two months ago and had become fast friends, so much as considering becoming roommates.

She knew that Renee had been obese when she joined, but had been so inspired by Robin's conviction that in two short months, she had trimmed down to 18% body fat and added more than an impressive amount of muscle mass for the time given.

She knew that Valentina had taken notice of them, at first positively, but now she was beginning to consider them a threat to her dominance.

She also knew that The Amulet had the power to take a wish and remold her reality to fit it, with only her the wiser.

Taking all of this new information impressively in stride, she shook her head and made her way to the barbell rack behind Renee.

"Honestly, I'm not sure why I stopped at the 50's. I guess because this rack ends with them and for any heavier I'd have to go down by Val." She instinctively grabbed the 100 lb bar and started what was now a manageable set, internally marveling at her new strength.

"What's wrong with Val? I'd think you and I would have a lot in common with her. I mean look at her, she's massive." The girls looked down at the European titaness, who was currently posing for a cameraman. "We both are clearly trying to build muscle, and she seems to be pretty good at it."

She was, indeed. The cameraman, seemingly professional but probably for a fetish site, was a fairly strong looking man in his own right, but Val easily overshadowed him.

"What's wrong with Valentina is that she's not that good at it. She cheats." Robin resumed curling her 100 lbs with renewed vigor. "She uses steroids and growth hormones. You and I, Renee, are still natural women. And that's better." With that declarative she dropped the barbell and returned to her double bicep flex, examining them from all angles. "Geez, I wonder how big these are now."

"Well, it's the end of the month and the end of the day's regimen, so it's time to find out." Renee responded, roughly letting down the preacher machine with a clank and producing a measuring tape. The Amulet had apparently advanced time to the end of the session because Robin had just walked in. "Me first, let's save the big ones for last."

Robin wrapped the tape around her (new?) friend's arm and announced "11 inches unflexed." She watched Renee curl her arm up fast and the tape felt like it was going to pull from her hand. "Whoa. That's quite a growth. 13-3/4 inches flexed. Nice!"

"Pffft. Not next to you, girl. Hand it over."

Renee wrapped the tape around Robin's new arm. it was truly going to be a surprise for her. "13 unflexed, good lord, and..." Renee curled her fist toward her shoulder "...shit. 15, no wait, 15-1/4..." and then Renee squeezed as hard as she could "...DAMN! 16-1/4 inches, Robin!"

Robin was shocked for several reasons. but most of all, she was realizing how unpredictable The Amulet was. After just wishing to finish a set, she added more than two inches to her arms and changed a good portion of her life.

How will Robin use the Amulet from here on out? She could truly make Jake a fool, wishing herself beyond his dreams. Hell, she could wish it to where all women were the dominant gender.

That seems dangerous, though. Who knows what the ramifications would be?
11331.title: Robin realizes The Amulet is altering reality

Robin was ambitious, but she was also a smart woman. She couldn't go changing things willy-nilly. After all, with just an extra set of curls she got huge arms and a new best friend.

Renee attacked the weights with a surprising second wind. It was as if she hadn't just performed an entire arm workout. Even more impressive was the weights she was using.

"I have no idea how I do it, But this crazy growth is the best feeling in the world." Renee panted as she pounded out reps with 80 lb dumbbells. It was clear the panting wasn't from exertion, but from reacting to her own reflection. "I just know I can do it today. If I hit these hard enough, I WILL pass up that roided freak today."

Robin was fascinated, staring intently at her friend's biceps. She was shocked that such a benign wish as wanting to change her clothes made Renee a superhuman muscle factory.

Renee dropped the 80's to the floor without bothering to rack them and reached to the 90's before something caught her eye. Robin had to hustle to keep up as her friend ran to a squat rack that someone had rudely left loaded with 225. Before she could move in to stop Renee or get ready to spot, it was already onto her considerable chest and, then on it's way down.

Renee appeared to be less woman and more animal as she heaved the 225 lb bar from her thighs back up to her chest. Each rep was accompanied by a growl and a visible change to the young girl's biceps. Robin didn't know her age hadn't yet noticed just how young the girl looked, and her youth was only exacerbated by the contrast of her constantly inflating arms. After ten curls, Renee let the weight rest on her quads.

"God, she's such a bitch. Always thinking she's better because she's bigger than everyone. Well, I'll show her who the real Queen of the Gym is."

Renee squeezed out five more lifts, each with a scream. Robin looked back over at Valentina, sure that she had taken notice of the noise. She hadn't, though, still engrossed in her photoshoot.

Once again Renee let the weight drop without racking it "That should do it, she said with a smirk. "Let's go show her her place."

Robin followed Renee looking over the largest woman she had ever seen in person. Her lifting blitz had seemingly worked and put her over the top of Val.

"Hey, camera guy. Why don't you forget this ugly bitch and take a look at what a real woman looks like with muscle." With that Renee flexed up a literally reality shattering double bicep flex.

The pair looked around and the photographer looked like he lost control of his face, with his eyes and mouth flying open. Valentina on the other hand just looked annoyed. "Oh look, fatty decided to lift some weights. Welcome to the club."

"Hey, don't talk down to me!" Renee released her flex to take a few steps forward. "Can't you see you've been outdone?"

"Ugh. We'll see about that. Matt, get the tape."

Matt, the photographer reached into his camera bag and retrieved a measuring tape and hurried back. Without a word, The European woman presented her ripped arm to Matt. Robin noted that even if Renee was bigger, Val was shredded beyond belief with a peak that looked sharp enough to cut yourself on.

Matt wrapped the tape around and balanced it over the highest peak of her arm "19 awesome inches, Val. That's crazy." He started snapping a few photos of the measurement.

"Ahem, you may want to shoot this little guy. Robin, tape." With that Renee put all of her energy into a double biceps flex.

Robin wrapped the tape around Renee's shaking arm. She was clearly squeezing out every centimeter.

"Oh, my God. Renee. You put on four inches in like 15 minutes. 22.5 inches!"

Robin dropped her hands to her hips, cocked one to the side and let out a laugh. "Ha! Who's Queen of the Gym now, bitch? And I'm all natural."

"I'll admit that's impressive for being clean." Val responded "Sigh I was going to save this for the video portion. You bash my juice, but let me show you what science can accomplish. Matt hold the tape."

Val brushed a rogue blonde lock from her face with her off hand, took a deep breath and closed her eyes. Suddenly her arm started to tremble.

"What the Hell is happening?" Renee asked to nobody in particular.

The trembling ceased and the craggy peak of her biceps started to slowly rise. Matt, against orders, dropped the tape just staring dumb-faced.

Val still had her eyes closed, her breathing increasing like a woman approaching orgasm. "Matt! Get the fucking tape!"

The photographer scrambled for the tape and encircled the still growing arm. "How are you doing this? It's up to 21 inches, but still growing."

"Pull it tighter, Matt, pull it fucking tight. Keep reading the... Oh God... Keep reading the numbers."

Matt squeezed the tape as tight as possible and her arm didn't give at all to the pressure. Val's breathing sped up.

"21.5... 22..."

"Oh, my God, Matt, I'm close." Val was practically hyperventilating by now.

"22.5... 23 inches, Val."

"AAAAAH!" This growing woman had just clearly came in the middle of the gym, as evidenced by her screaming moan and suddenly wet spandex shorts.

Her sex noise wasn't the only sound. During the orgasm, her arm surged up and ripped through the cloth measuring tape. Panting, she extended her hand to Robin. "May I?"

Timidly, Robin surrendered her tape and Val wrapped it around her own biceps. Matt was currently sitting on the nearest bench, his mind clearly blown.

"Well, would you look at that. 28, no, wait." She adjusted the tape. "29 inches. I just gained 10 inches by cumming. Science, bitch. Also, it's my own formula. I'm not just the Queen of the Gym, but Queen of the Lab, too.

"And you say I use steroids, well I did for a little bit. And unfortunately I still have some of the symptoms. Then I realized steroids were cheating, letting someone else do the work for you. But I did all of this work. This was all made by me!"

Robin couldn't believe her eyes. She had changed a lot by magic, but Val was right. The Amulet had changed a lot, but it hadn't touched Val.

"Not to mention, what's the point of being the most muscular woman if you're full of male hormones. Well, I found a non-steroidal way to get huge. The best part is that it's triggered only by female arousal. I haven't found a way to make it work for men. Haha, it makes sex... interesting."

Was Robin wrong about Valentina? Turns out she really was all woman, and up close, the steroid symptoms weren't nearly so bad. Not just that, but This woman (WOMAN!) had made a major scientific breakthrough that led to her outgrowing men. Now it seems like this is someone to be respected.

But she still didn't build the body naturally. Robin had wanted to prove that the female body could naturally match a man's. She had used magic, though, to augment the "natural." Was she a hypocrite?

How did Robin feel about Val?

Arms and legs and chest and back, everything all at once, expanding to unbelievable proportions. 4'5'', then 5', then 5'5'', growing all the way up to Brian's ceiling, about to bump her head. All while this was happening, Brian was wide-eyed looking at Alexis' transformation occurring, initially having to look down at his sister, slowly, bringing his head up higher and higher, having to look at her, eye-to-eye. Brian was pretty short for a high school student, let alone a teenager- only 5'5'', so when Alexis slowed down her transformation, Brian was only eye-level to 12-year old Alexis' gigantic, muscular, heaving pecs, just inches in front of his face. Alexis moaned, gave a little stretch of her arms, and said, "Ok, Brian, NOW I'm ready." Brian darted towards his door, but Alexis grabbed his arm, just a bit too hard and she could hear a couple bones in his arm and hand crack, and almost snap in two. Brian was about to scream in utter pain, but Alexis covered his mouth with her gigantic hand, although she could have simply wrapped her whole hand around his head and pop it like a grape if she needed to as well. "Brian, shhhhhh, you're gonna get our parents' attention, and we don't want that, now do we? So I suggest that you keep quiet, or I'll make you quiet. We have a bet to finish here, remember?" Brian whimpered, and shook his head ever so slightly about to pass out from the pain occurring. Alexis then picked Brian up as if he were a piece of paper, carried him in her arms, and lightly put him down in his chair, as she went to her's, which creaked and groaned when she ever so slightly sat down on her's. "Ok Brian, let's do this. You sounded so eager a few seconds ago. What's wrong?" "Aghhhhh! ok, fine.... I don't back down from challenges" Brian said in agonizing pain. "You should have backed down from this. Ok, 3. 2. 1. GO!" Brian began flexing his arm straining to get some ground on his "little" sister, grunting and groaning, with no effect at all. Alexis gave out a fake yawn, looked at Brian struggling, giggled a huge, deep, giggle, and said between laughs, "Oh, I'm sorry, did we start? I almost forgot." Alexis, finished off Brian's already broken arm, by completely crushing it in her hand, and quickly slammed down his arm against the table, creating a huge SMACK, then BANG, Ultimately destroying the table out from under them. Brian was just about to scream bloody murder, but Alexis quickly placed her size 13 foot on top of his mouth and said, "If you scream a LETTER, I will crush you like a bug, and you will never see the light of day again. This is an awakening for both you and me Brian. It looks like I'll be the BIG sister from now on, Ok? First, no more taking my money. In fact, I'll be taking your money from now on, starting with this" Alexis grabbed into Brian's right pocket, and took his wallet. She opened it and grabbed the $1,100 from within it. "Wow! Sweet! I hit the jackpot! Anyways, Brian, secondly, if I ever need help from you, which is almost highly unlikely, for- ANYTHING- you help, whether you like it or not. Thirdly, you stay out of my way, and I'll TRY to stay out of your's. You understand all of what I'm saying?" Brian shook his head as best he could, and pointed with his left hand, pointing at his broken, right arm. "Oh yeah, you want that fixed, huh? I'll see what I can do" Alexis said, as she closed her eyes, focused on her brother, for once, and all of sudden, Brian's right arm began to glow bright white, and began to grow in size. His arm straightened back out, and started to increase in muscle size as well. His bicep grew larger, stronger, until the shoulder part of his shirt began to stretch and then rip in half. Brian's right arm, and only his right arm, grew, but not even close to Alexis'. Brian's arm rivaled the size of a female bodybuilder's, but barely. Alexis finally got her foot off his mouth, and said, "Remember Brian, you even get close to an IDEA of messing with me, and what happened to your arm, will happen again, but throughout your whole body, and 10X worse. And I won't fix it next time." She raised her Titanic right arm, fist in the air, as if to punch Brian. Brian flinched, she put it back down, pointed at him and laughed. "You should've seen the look on your face" Alexis said through her giggling. Alexis finally got up, left Brian's bedroom, heard the front doorbell ring, and thought, ".........."

152311.content: Alexis closed her eyes, focused on shrinking, and finally shrunk back into her normal size, which she referred to as "Girl Mode", and her huge, muscular form of herself as "Hulk Mode". When she got downstairs, her mother came by and said, "Hey, Honey. Cassidy's mother called and said Cassidy would like to have a play date with you. How about you get into some new clothes, and head right over. You look like you live in a cardboard box. I buy you those clothes to last, not so you can just wear them with no care in the world. Please honey, be more careful with your clothing next time. Now go up to your room and get dressed" Alexis' mother said, with confusion as to what her daughter could possibly be doing to cause such huge rips and tears throughout her shirts and pants. Alexis went up to her room, changed clothes, went back downstairs, said goodbye to her parents, went out the door, and ran all the way to Cassidy's house. DING DONG! went Cassidy's front door bell. the door swung right open, and there was Cassidy's mother. "Oh, hello Alexis, how are you today?" "I'm good. Do you know where Cassidy is?" "Oh yes, she's downstairs with her other friend, Sierra. I hope you girls enjoy each others time together. I have cookies and lemonade up here if you need some." "Ok, Thank you" Alexis said, as she stormed past Cassidy's mother, ran down the flight of stairs, and stared directly at Cassidy and Sierra. Cassidy was a 15-year old, who met Alexis back in Elementary School, when Alexis was only in the 2nd grade, and Cassidy in the 5th. In Alexis' eyes, Cassidy was a bit different than her peers, mostly being into stuff, girls and other kids would be interested in the 2nd grade. She wasn't... Mentally handicapped... Just acted a little younger than she should have, is all. Sierra, on the other hand was 16-years old, and met Cassidy in the start of her Freshman year. They hit it off pretty well, and became pretty good friends ever since. This was only the second time they ever met, the first being a couple days ago at the mall, when Alexis spent her allowance money. "Alexis! How are you? You remember Sierra, right?" Cassidy asked, looking directly into Sierra's eyes, no two girls Alexis has seen look at each other before. "Uhhhh, Hi Alexis. I'm- Doing- Fine......" As she said this, Sierra looked directly back at Cassidy, locked lips with her, and gave her a moist kiss on the lips. Alexis turned a shade of red, more confused about this situation than the whole, huge, hulking body, growing and shrinking, situation. "Oh, Alexis, I'm sorry. I almost forgot to tell you. Sierra's my girlfriend" Cassidy said, grinning towards Sierra, love plastered over her face, then looking at Alexis. "Girlfriend? How does that work- Look, that doesn't matter right now. I have something to show you two" Alexis said. "Alexis, what could it possibly be. I know you can get easily excited at times, but-" Cassidy stopped mid-sentence to witness her best friend glowing, like a shining star. She witnessed Alexis begin to grow upwards and outwards. Muscles growing and expanding, biceps forming getting bigger and stronger, calves and thighs, expanding larger and more muscular than a male and female bodybuilder combined. Cassidy and Sierra looking on in pure awe and amazement, their jaws dropping almost to the floor. Alexis' clothing, for about the third time so far, began to get skin tight, stretch to amazing lengths, then rip apart at the seams, around her arms, legs, steel-plated chest and abs, and around her back. The looks on both Sierra's and Cassidy's faces looked like they saw Justin Bieber, One Direction, and Jesus Christ, all at the same time. Alexis stopped looking like a 12-year old again, and was in her full-on "Hulk Mode" again. "You like?" Alexis asked, jokingly, to show tha, even though, the huge muscle-bound body was what was different, it was still Cassidy's good ol' friend's head on top, to show that she's still her old, wisecracking self. "But how? But why? But who?!" Cassidy asked, trying to get any information out of her hulking friend. "Yesterday, I wished upon a shooting star, hpoing to get really big, and the next day, I woke up in a broken, bed, all muscly and veiny, and what not." "Wow, Alexis. I don't know to believe what I'm hearing, or believe what I'm seeing" Cassidy said in the utmost confusion and awestruck. "Me too" Sierra said, trying to get her two cents in. "You better believe it, all 450 pounds of it. The thing is Cassidy- Sierra- This isn't the power I got." "There's more?!" Cassidy asked, afraid her friend was going to grow a third arm, or a second head. "Well, as my transformation happened, I was having a dream. A dream that the shooting star itself took form of an aura of power, and said that, not only am I super strong, to say the least, I'm able to give or take strength from others. Make the weak, strong, and the strong, weak" Alexis said, awaiting a response that would test her new-found powers. "So? what do you two have to say?" Alexis waited for a response, until Sierra said, "You're Hot! I'm sorry Cassidy, but your friend over there is pretty cute for a muscle girl!" Sierra said, suddenly revealing a secret, not only to Alexis, but to Cassidy as well, that Sierra was into muscular body's, not only on men, but on girls- MOSTLY, on girls as well. "Wow. Uhhh, thank you" Alexis said, blushing in embarrassment, wondering who Sierra was beginning to like more. Cassidy looked at her girlfriend, utterly shocked and confused. "Ok, THIS is the weirdest day EVER." "Anyways, how about we put the past behind us and uncover more of what my "superpowers" are all about, ok? OK?" Alexis asked, hoping to get a response in order to break the silence. "Fine, I'm fine with that" Cassidy said, a bit upset about the whole situation. "Ok, so, first things first, my first power is the most obvious. I'm super strong and muscular. So-" "My father works out on the side. He has a workout gym in the next room over. We could see how strong you are" Cassidy said. "Nice, or, we could try out my second power, giving or taking someone's strength" Alexis said. "I have an idea, why don't we let Sierra decide. Don't you think so, Cassidy?" Alexis said, thinking that Alexis should start being nice to Sierra, so that she could better their friendship, although she thought that that was unnecessary, seeing that Alexis' strength and muscular body alone, kind of locked in her friendship with Sierra, it seemed. "Yeah, sure I'm fine with that" Cassidy said, almost sarcastically, wishing that she could've chose what to do. "Ok, great. So, Sierra, what should we do?" Alexis asked, awaiting a response. "Ummm, I think we should........."

Alexis found some less torn clothing, a pair of shorts and a little princess tee shirt. She slipped on a pair of shoes and made her way to Cassidy's house. Her big brother would get his comeuppance, but first she wanted to show Cassidy, She knew she would freak out, but also she might just be able to help out. Cassidy spent most of her spare time looking at female bodybuilders on the web, but she was chubby bordering on fat and she only occasionally felt motivated to lift some of the weights she had been bought for her birthday.
Alexis padded across the grass and threw a couple of pebbles at Cassidy's window until the curtains drew back. Cassidy waved and beckoned her friend, who duly shinned up the drainpipe and climbed through the window.
"You alright Alexis? I hope your big brother hasn't been bullying you" She tried to cover the computer screen, but Alexis saw the image of a fbb before she switched it off."
"You still looking at those sites Cass?"
They both sat on the bed. Cassidy nodded. "I really want to be as strong and big, it's just...well I get picked on at the gym, and I dunno". She sighed, and Alexis nodded sympathetically. They had both been bullied at the gym Alexis for being small and skinny and Cassidy for being fat.

Alexis smiled. "Just don't freak, promise me."

First she felt the warmth in her shoulders which began to get broader, the tendons and sinews getting stronger to accommodate the growing muscle. She felt a constriction in her neck and then the warm feeling as it began to get thicker, veins standing out until it was like a tree-trunk. She heard Cassidy gasp, but the girl didn't run. She was so obsessed with muscle that she was rooted to the spot, her mouth open in a small 'o' of surprise.
Next Alexis felt her arms begin to grow her wrists thickened, and her biceps began to expand, ripping though the 'little princess' tee shirt as they grew to 20 inches and beyond. They were like water melons with veins running across them. Huge and powerful, capable of crushing anything. Alexis stood just in time, remembering what happened to her own bed which was in two pieces. Now her chest expanded, ripping the tee shirt further as her enormous pecs pushed outward, meanwhile her abdominals tightened, rock hard and defined.
Now she began to get taller, her shorts stretching but not tearing as her quads bulged outward. The floor creaked as her weight gained, until she reached 450lbs of muscle. She looked down on her friend Cassidy who had edged back but not run off. Her mouth was still open as she looked at the 6 foot 5 muscular goddess stood before her. Alexis was sweating as her body adjusted to the new metabolism.
"I ..I don't understand" said Cassidy edging forward..."Hoiw?"
"I'll explain it all" said Alexis. "Would you like to inspect."?
Cassidy nodded and edged shyly closer as Alexis bent down and flexed one enormous bicep which was bigger than Cassidy's head. She gingerly touched it feeling how smooth it was, it's hardness and the power within it.
When she could speak she said Alexis I have something to ask"

153.content:
Rhonda was a rare specimen. As a 29 year old beautiful young woman, comics were an uncommon pastime. She sat watching the Avengers for the hundredth, or thousandth time, as usual focusing on her favorite, The Hulk. Every time she saw him, whether on film, paper, or computer screen she got hot and bothered. And motivated. That's the other thing that made her rare, like always she watched from the weight bench in the corner of her bedroom.

While Bruce was on the screen she felt like she could go on forever. As she watched his muscles bulge and flex on her tv, she worked hers hard in the hopes that she could be like him. She lost track of how many curls she had done and she really didn't care at this point. Rare indeed, there are not a lot of beautiful women into superheroes and bodybuilding.

The scene with her hero ended and she dropped the weights. She made her way over to the mirror hanging on her closet and gave an impressive flex. Satisfied with herself, she made her way downstairs for a post workout meal. She was nowhere near the Hulk's size, but even she knew that was a bit of pipe dream. "You need to eat to grow." She thought to herself as she made her way towards the kitchen.

Rhonda was very much a product of her family, who she reluctantly still lived with at 29. Her father, Bill, was a technological genius who had introduced her to the finer points of nerdery. Her love of Comics, video games, movies, and all other forms of science fiction and fantasy stemmed directly from him.

Her mom, Cindy, was a personal trainer and obviously a good one. Although she was nearing her 60th birthday, she could pass for an older (And arguably hotter) sister of Rhonda's. She didn't have the desire for massive muscle that her daughter did, though, preferring to keep her body tight, lean, and sculpted beyond belief.

Rhonda opened the fridge grabbing a protein shake and leftover steak from dinner. As she closed the door she found...

1533.content:
"'Sup dork?" her sister Chrissy stated more than asked as she leaned against the counter, having snuck quietly behind the fridge door to make a theatrical entrance. Rhonda almost dropped her food. "Feeding those muscles of yours?" She said with a smirk.

"Yep. Growing guns need grub." Rhonda said flexing the arm holding her plate as she put it in the microwave.

"You have to work so hard for your body. It's a shame I got all the sexy genes." It was an exaggeration, but true. Rhonda was a very attractive woman, especially with the muscle she's built on herself. Chrissy, however, was a natural and today she was showing it all off. Golden blonde hair in a high ponytail. A sheer tanktop not doing anything to hide the F-Cup bra or tight abs that she gave no effort to earn. Daisy duke jean shorts showing off her mile long legs that brought her height to 6'1", legs with impressive tone emphasized by the 4-inch wedge heels she wore.

"Yeah, yeah. We get it. You're hot." Rhonda said with a roll of her eyes. "Quit bragging." Rhoda turned while the microwave hummed. spreading her lats and flexing her shoulders.

"Yeah, yeah. We get it. You're buff." Chrissy mocked. "You know what? We got a new cheerleading coach this year, and she's actually going to make us weight train. Can you believe that?" She scoffed. " Who knows, though? Maybe I'll get 'big muskels' like my big sister."

With that, Chrissy gave a double bicep flex. This should be good. Rhonda thought to herself. Sure she's a knockout, but other than cheerleading she stays far from anything athletic.

To her surprise, though, the 18-year-old's biceps showed considerable definition. It must have surprised Chrissy, too, as her eyebrows raised at the sight of her own arms. She lowered her arms and then quickly doubled down on the flex, clearly pushing harder. She pushed so hard her fists shook, bring a noticeable peak to her biceps. It wasn't as big as Rhonda's, but it was jagged and every muscle fiber was clearly visible with the teen's low body fat.

"Hmm. I was totally going to brush off weightlifting, but it looks like I got this gene, too." Chrissy said through clinched teeth, still holding and admiring her already muscular arm. "What do you think of that?"

1541.content:
Paige loved her life. Why shouldn't she? She was just leaving her office after a vigorous "meeting" with her top trainer, Jeff, and stopped to observe her gym. She owned it in both the literal sense and the figurative. The place was full of beautiful people, all of them working hard to look even better. As hard as they worked, none of them could hold a candle to her magnificence.

Even at 38, the 6-foot blonde was as stunning as any of the teens or 20-somethings, and it was only enhanced by the body she had built. Weighing 190 lbs of shredded mass, she had won the top overall prize at her last 15 bodybuilding contests, and none had really been close.

Her life was great. On top of it all she had finally convinced her 18-year old daughter, Samantha, to start lifting seriously, and it made their relationship all the better. As a matter of fact, Sam was supposed to meet her here right after school, which should be any minute now, and Paige couldn't wait.

Little did she know, today was going to change her outlook on her perfect life.
