15411.content:
Samantha walked through the doors at IronWorks, her hips swaying more than they probably needed to. She saw Jeff sitting at the front desk and shot him wink and a dainty wave. The beauty that she inherited from her mom was enough to turn all the heads in the room. Her catholic schoolgirl uniform, complete with shorter than regulation skirt, turned her into a walking wet dream.

That's how she used to think of herself. She had loved the way her thin body and large chest got stares from everyone her whole life. Lately though, she's noticed that those eyes have been drifting to other girls. Girls with a different body type. Girls with muscle.

Fortunately for Samantha, she knew something of an expert in the matter. She rounded the corner to see her mom standing outside the office, presumably waiting for her. She had to mention that she was impressed. Her mom had taken up lifting to lose the baby weight 18 years ago and never stopped. Now at almost 40, she looked no more than a pumped up, sexy 25.

"Hey there baby! Excited to get started?" Paige greeted. The smile making her even prettier.

"I guess so, mom. Where are we starting?"

"I thought we'd start with chest." Paige strikes an easy crab pose that blew up her muscles to perfectly frame her C-cup chest. This got Samantha excited. Her breasts were one of the parts of her body she felt were better than her mom. Even though she was thin and without much muscle, her youth kept her DDs perky.

Paige caught her daughter admiring her body and flexed the most muscular harder. "This will be a long process, Sam. You can't get a body like this overnight."

How does Samantha's training go?
15411.title: Samantha decides to really commit to growth.

choices: Samantha is hiding her real size. She can flex much bigger.
Samantha's growth doesn't slow and she catches her mom.
154111.content:
Paige looked up from the stack on her desk and rubbed her eyes. Unfortunately, running the most successful gym in town led to a lot of paperwork. She needed a break and should probably check on the floor anyway. Looking at the clock, she saw that school was out, which meant Samantha was probably working out right now.

When she had introduced her daughter to lifting 4 months ago, she had thought that it would lead to more bonding time. She had been right and then some. They spent more than an hour per day together pumping iron and had never felt closer. Sam was nothing if not driven and had taken her training to the next level. In addition to their morning sessions together, she came and lifted alone after school almost every day. She had studied her nutrition and supplements and took every advantage of her prime genetics for building muscle.

Paige opened the blinds from her office and easily found Samantha on the floor. She stood curling in the squat rack, breaking a cardinal rule in the gym and obviously not caring. Her small audience clearly didn't care either as they admired the body that had been unbelievably built in only a few months. Although it was bad manners to curl in the squat rack, she didn't look too out of place, since the 45 lb bar was loaded with a 45 lb plate on either side. Her biceps stood out in sharp high peaks as she lifted the impressive weight from her thighs to her chest. her form was impeccable and she clearly wasn't maxing out.

She was so proud of her daughter. Paige knew firsthand how hard bodybuilding was, especially for women, and to see her daughter succeed seemingly with ease was a dream come true.

She watched as Samantha racked the large weight and smiled to her crowd, trying to act like they weren't there. After much goading and prodding, they talked her into a flex. Sam acted like she was she before raising her arms directly over her head and lowering them slowly to the 90 degree angles. The crowd cheered, but Paige just stared dumbfounded. Although they trained together almost every day, and she knew her daughter was making impressive gains, she hadn't seen a true flex since nearly the beginning.

Looking at the teenager now, it was clear that nobody else around was in her league. When she had started lifting she had almost no body fat, yet now she looked even more cut. Paige didn't know how that was possible. She had added at least 6 inches to her arms in the last 4 months, bringing them to what looks like 15 inches, which should have been impossible anyway, but Samantha did it without a soft bulking phase, retaining her shredded sinewy form.

The older woman turned to the mirror in her office and put up a bicep flex of her own and smiled. She loved her daughter and was excited for her progress, but she still wanted to be the most muscular person she knew. She grinned at her world record 21-inch bicep knowing that there wasn't a woman, here or anywhere, that could compare to her, and surely Sam's growth would slow soon.

Satisfied with herself, Paige leaves her office and joins the fray in the gym.
154111.title: Impressive muscle growth is in her DNA.

choices: Paige takes this as a challenge and trains to surpass her daughter.
Paige thinks her daughter is in over her head and tries to gently talk her down.
1541111.content:
Paige decided to find Samantha first, to get a closer look at her. She was still reeling from both the impressive 135 pound curl and the large bicep flex. Paige saw that Samantha was wiping off her arms and looking down at the weight she had just curled. Samantha had on her light gray top that barely covered her strong, athletic chest and tight gray athletic shorts that hugged her perfect, sprinter sized behind. It was as if Paige was looking at Samantha for the first time since when they worked out together Samantha wore outfits more conservative that covered up most of her body. Paige stood at 5 foot 8, a good four inches taller than her daughter. Paige enjoyed the advantage and often kidded her daughter about her superior height, always seemingly wanting to be on top in every way. But as Paige neared her Samantha, she was almost taken aback by both her daughter’s beauty and her hard, strong physique. Her competitive side took a small hit at the sight. Clearing her throat as she reached Samantha, Paige tried to sound upbeat.

“Hey Sam. I caught your little act. Very impressive.”

Samantha, broken from her thought, looked up and gave her mother a slight smile.

“Thank you. It was, well, nothing special.”

Paige turned her head to the side. “Nothing special? For someone whose only been working out for four months with me, I’d say it was more than that. That’s a lot of weight and I hadn’t seen you flex up your muscles that big before.”

Paige’s ego and competitiveness spoke next. “But don’t expect these types of gains to continue. Everyone plateaus. Even your mother.”

Samantha stared at her mother for a moment, deciding carefully what she wanted to say next. Not only did Samantha have her mother’s ability to gain muscle, but she was just as competitive. Only in both cases, much more so than her mother even knew.

Samantha smiled, deciding that maybe now was the time. Walking toward the disks, Samantha pulled off two more 45’s and with surprising ease brought them over toward the bar she had just curled.

“Well I wouldn’t know anything about this plateau thing. And you haven’t noticed that I’ve actually been working out twice a day.”

As Samantha placed the 45’s on either end of the bar and pulled the locks over the bar Paige looked confused.

“What? What do you mean? We’ve been working out together nearly every day for several hours. We were both very tired after those work-outs.”

Samantha smiled as she stood back up and walked around to set herself near the bar.

“Well sure we have been working out, but I wasn’t really tired. And after the first month I was finding our work-outs rather, well light. I didn’t want you to worry, or to be scared, but our work-outs had become merely a warm-up for me. It was the night time work-outs by myself that were the real ones.”

Paige’s expression went from surprised to concern as she looked at her daughter.

“What, what do you mean?”

Samantha smiled as she reached down and pulled up the bar, now loaded to 225 pounds, to her thighs.

“What I mean, mother, is I’m actually much stronger than you think.”

With a superior smirk on her young, angelic face, Samantha slowly pulled the bar up toward her chest, holding her expression, which indicated to Paige that this incredible feat was hardly taxing her daughter, only causing her concern to grow. Samantha chuckled as she continued to curl the weight.

“Yeah, that’s right mom, I’m curling 225 pounds. Which, if I’m not wrong, is your max weight. Very impressive for a woman. Probably near a record.”

After 12 hard reps, Samantha dropped the weight and smiled at her stunned mother.

“But sad to say mother, not my best. And as far as being impressed with my biceps, do you want to see what curling 225 really does to my muscles?”

Samantha didn’t wait for her mother to reply as she pulled up her arms and flexed down hard. The muscles that rose up into rock hard, shredded mountains of steel caused Paige to gasp. If there was any fat on her arms, Paige couldn’t see it. Every muscle fiber, every cut, ever detail literally exploded across her arm, bulging her mighty bicep even bigger than she had flexed just moments before! Samantha chuckled at her mother’s stunned expression.

“Yeah mom, these babies are over 19 inches around now, you know, when I pump them up and flex down hard. Not quite up to your 21 monsters, but given the fact that I’m 4 inches shorter, they look as big as yours. And they are definitely harder. And stronger. Have you ever seen such detail, such definition? Heck, my biceps blow away most men!”

Releasing her flex Samantha shook her arms and licked her lips. “And in case you were wondering, I’ve entered the regional bodybuilding cost coming up in a few weeks. The class winners get their pro card. And then the Olympia is just a few months later. Can you just imagine how big and powerful I’ll be by then? Won’t that be fun?”

Paige’s heart pounded at the idea that her daughter was still growing bigger and would be challenging her on stage. Trying to cover her near dread at the prospects, Paige forced a smile.

“Well of course sweetheart. If anyone was going to ever beat me on stage, who better than my daughter.” Paige paused as Samantha held her own smile. “But there’s a lot more to winning than having big biceps.”

Samantha chuckled. “True. Preparation, routines, I get it. But who says I’ll be competing against you?”

Paige raised her eyebrows. She had thought this little show for her mother was all about knocking the queen off her thrown.

“What do you mean?”

Samantha stared back at her mother with steel resolve. “What I’m saying if I can keep these gains going, that maybe I’ll compete against the men!”

Paige could only stare as her jaw dropped open.
1541111.title: Samantha's Surprise

15411111.content:
"Compete against the men?" Paige laughed nervously, "I would doubt that." she managed to stammer.
"I think you are doing well enough to train on your own now." Paige finished and headed off to work out what to do.

Paige was truly worried about the upcoming regional bodybuilding competition. She had been sure of being able to win the contest yet her own daughter had built a physique almost as impressive as Paige in only four months.

'I need to step up my training for sure!' thought Paige, I'll double my training and triple my calories and prove to Sam that I am still the greatest bodybuilder.

The next morning Paige rose to the alarm at 3am. She gingerly rolled out of bed and headed to the kitchen. There she pulled out ten containers of food for the day and drank her first protein shake of the day.

Her workout routine was normally a split routine. Legs, chest, back, cardio, bi's and tri's, shoulders and abs, cardio and then repeat.

In order to beat Samantha, Paige figured on doing a whole week routine each day. Splitting out each day into a single two hour routine.

The training was torturous, as each session passed, Paige felt more and more fatigued. Her muscles were screaming at her to stop. Yet she continued.

Finally exhausted, she returned home to rest. Her muscles quivering with the expended effort.

The next morning Paige woke to the alarm at 3am again. She felt extremely tired still, she could barely move. She thought of her daughter beating her and hauled herself out of bed. Pulled on her workout clothes and headed down to the kitchen.

At the gym, Paige had just finished training her legs when one of the gym regulars, Herman passed by. "Looking huge Paige!" he said, "You competing this comp?"
"Yes, but I want to be even more huge" Paige said, panting from her efforts.

Herman looked around to check the gym was empty, and leaned his beefy 300lb bulk towards Paige, "I have something that could give you an edge. Experimental though" he said, "Interested?"

Paige thought about it and said....
15411111.title: Paige takes this as a challenge and trains to s...

choices: Head home in case something bad happens
Continue working out to make the most of the liquid
154111111.content:
Herman nodded and motioned Paige to follow. They went into the men's changing room together, it was empty and Herman headed to one of the many purple lockers and spun the padlock dial a few time. It opened with a click and he reached inside.

Paige caught sight of a black bag which Herman rummaged in and a glimpse of a number of glass tubes of slightly yellow colored liquid.

Herman closed up the bag and handed Paige a glass tube. "Add 1ml to your protein shake in the morning" he said, "that should be enough to make a huge change to your physique. There is 5ml in here, which is enough for the week. You definitely wouldn't want anymore than that" Herman finished and checked that Paige had understood.

Paige accepted the glass tube and memorised the locker number that Herman was standing in front of. Nodded to his instructions and headed out to the women's changing rooms. In the changing room she added the glass tube to her bag, carefully wrapping it in one of her knee wraps for safety and headed back out to continue her workout.

The rest of her grueling routine passed by in a blur. Paige was so tired that she cut short her exercising thinking it would be better to give her muscles a chance to rest and recuperate than completely smash them. Besides, Herman's experimental liquid would be her edge.

Paige returned home about 3pm to have a nap and spent a lazy evening recovering.

The next morning the alarm went off at 3am and Paige hauled herself out of bed. She was very excited this morning as this would be the first day she would be trying out the experimental liquid. She had her protein shake out and then realised that 1ml was going to be tricky to measure out as she didn't have a way of measuring 1ml.
'Hmm, a teaspoon is 5ml and so is the tube. I need to pour out a fifth somehow.' After pondering this for a while Paige decided she would have to just estimate the amount. She tipped the tube hoping it was about right, shook her shake and drank it.

Nothing seemed different so she packed her gym bag and headed out for her workout.

On arrival the gym was deserted, she was the only one there. Paige went to the squat rack and did a warm up. It was then that she realised that her muscles didn't feel fatigued at all. It was as if she had been resting for a week and was just starting new!
Paige performed a number of sets of squats, increasing the weight each time. Her muscles seemed to be enjoying the work and she could feel them responding, expanding larger with each rep and increase in weight.

After an hour Paige thought it was time to check out the results. She looked down at her legs. The quadriceps were standing out magnificently, basking with the work and begging for more. She went to her bag and pulled out a tape measure. Wow! Her legs were another inch larger. Of course that would wear off as the pump wore off but she hadn't ever seen a pump of more than half an inch before. This was great!

The rest of her work out was much the same. Her strength was improved and her muscles responded to the additional weight. She was feeling so much more powerful. She could definitely outgrow her daughter Samantha.

At the end of the day, Paige headed home happy in her discovery and keen to work out the following day.

The next couple of days passed much the same way, Paige would rise at 3am, have her spiked protein shake and head to the gym. Over the three days she had made some incredible gains. Her legs had grown one and a half inches and her biceps close to an inch. An incredible feat in only three days.

On the fourth morning Paige woke up, turned off the alarm and headed to the kitchen. Today would be different, rather than pouring half of the remaining liquid into her protein shake she tipped in the whole lot, about double the amount Herman had told her to use. She headed out to the gym to begin her workout.

On arriving at the gym Paige took out her tape measure, she wanted to check how much she could pump up at the gym. Biceps 22 inches, quads 32 inches, calves 23 inches, 'That should do for now.' she thought, 'Time to get huge!'

Starting with squats again, Paige popped up and down like a machine. She could feel her legs working and admired the muscles bulging and bunching under her bright green leggings in the mirror. It was so hypnotising. She eventually stopped and added a working weight of about 350lbs. 'Wow it was so easy!' thought Paige, 'I could do this the whole day!'
After finishing her 30th rep Paige stopped. She could see the muscularity of her legs clearly defined in her leggings now. They had definitely got a pump and she was excited to see the result. The tape measure came to 34 inches, a pump of about 2 inches and Paige felt she could do more.

Realising there was no one else in the gym Paige thought briefly and then headed quickly to the mens changing rooms. 'Herman presumably still had his stash in that locker' she thought, 'I could pick up some more as a backup maybe'
Inside the locker room she made a beeline to the locker, number 317 she remembered. A bit of force from her muscular hands popped open the locker and she soon had a little black bag open revealing six glass tubes and she noticed under the black bag a large bottle which also held a yellowy liquid which looked a bit more colored than the glass tubes.

Paige realised she hadn't thought through what she was going to do and looked at her half full water bottle. She decided to pour some of the yellow liquid from the bottle into her drink bottle until it was about three quarters full and then put everything back in the locker and locked everything up. Paige quickly walked back out to the gym and resumed her leg workout.

As the day continued Paige was conscious to use the water fountains in the gym as she wasn't sure of how many doses of liquid were now in her drink bottle. This worked well until late in the afternoon and Paige was putting her arms through a particularly gruelling set of bicep curls with 300lbs. Her fibres were burning and her biceps were pumped to the max. If she could have measured them they would have peaked at 23.5 inches. "Arrrgh!" exclaimed Paige and dropped the bar in the squat rack. She immediately grabbed her drink bottle and drank deeply. After consuming about a third of the drink she suddenly realised what she had done.

'Nothing particularly seemed to be happening which was good' thought Paige, 'Maybe I should go home, or should I continue my workout?'
154111111.title: "Yes! Show me the good stuff!"

choices: They start to recruit and grow a group of "Badass Bitches."
15411112.content:
Paige stood dumbfounded not knowing what to say. She started to gather her composure, but before any words could come from her suddenly dry mouth, her daughter started laughing.

"Don't worry, mom. I know I'm gaining at a superhuman rate and I don't plan to stop." She punctuated this with another awe inspiring bicep flex in the mirror. "But I wouldn't want to compare myself to men when I am still... Oh. So. Much. Woman." With these last few words, Samantha changed her posing style to one more reminiscent of a Playboy magazine, pushing out or squeezing together her bulbous breasts while showing off an ass to make a Kardashian blush.

"I don't want to just get huge and embarrass a bunch of guys and dominate men's bodybuilding," She began to mix in some muscular flexes with her still provocative movements. "I want to reimagine bodybuilding for women. To Hell with the current idea of what a strong woman should look like. I want the goal to be to get as big as possible and be as sexy as possible."

"Just how are you going to do that, Sam? They'll just call you a freak and rank you last." Paige said, finally breaking her mind free from the piece of art that was her daughter's body.

"Easy, mom. It started with you."

"Me?"

"Uh yeah. Don't be silly. You're the biggest woman around and hotter than any girl at my high school. And you keep winning. Clearly it's what people want. So we convince a few other ladies to grow like me and..."

"Sorry to break it to you, honey. Nobody else will grow like you, not even me. Like you said, I'm bigger than any other and I've hit my peak. I haven't added any significant mass for months."

"Sure you can you just haven't figured out how. I had to get these genes from somewhere." Samantha stated, absentmindedly curling her arms. "It certainly wasn't dad, he was a stick figure. One of your thighs is bigger than his chest ever was."

"So, what do you say, mom? We recruit a few badass bitches and turn the game on its head."
15411112.title: Paige thinks her daughter is in over her head

choices: Bodybuilding is harder than it seems and she just can't get the size she wants.
Sasha gains muscle at a normal pace.
Muscle comes easy to Sasha and she catches up to Katy in no time.
1542.content:
Sasha felt out of place, but was utterly fascinated. She found herself sitting in the front row at a bodybuilding competition, in the middle of a world she had never experienced. She was here to support her friend Katy, whom she met at work when the girl was hired just a few weeks ago. The two had become fast friends, and most of their time together was spent with Sasha marveling over her young friend's body.

It was wonderful. It stood for what a woman could be. What a woman could do when she wasn't restrained by society's blueprint for the female body. Katy had the body that she wanted to have; one that she had worked hard for. No, she didn't have large breasts, and while she did have an hourglass shape, it wasn't the kind you'd find in Playboy or Hustler. Her hourglass was marked by huge shoulders and legs bigger than Sasha's torso. Katy was such an inspiration to Sasha. At just shy of 20 years old, she stood on a stage showing off her determination and ability as a woman.

And Katy wasn't just your run-of-the-mill bodybuilder. In under 2 years she had gone from being an average high school girl to winning the heavyweight class and overall at her first competition standing next to women that had been doing this for as long as she had been alive.

During an intermission Katy came down to where Sasha was sitting beaming with pride.

"Oh my god! You were amazing! This whole thing is amazing!" Sasha was gushing and she knew it. She didn't care. She had made a decision. "I want to train with you. I want to be a part of all of this."

"Haha. Thanks, and thanks for coming." Katy responded, humored by her friend's enthusiasm. "Are you sure? It's a lot of work."

"Yes. Never been more sure of anything."

"It's not all running on treadmills and lifting weights. You'll have to give up a lot, and you'll probably lose these." Katy smirked as she poked at Sasha's C-cups.

"Pffft. So what? It'll be worth it to be so strong, so big. Us ladies have muscles, too. Why should men be the only ones making them bigger?" She flexed her untrained arms. She had a decent start, carrying dishes and glasses while bartending and waiting tables the past few years had kept her arms much more toned than the average woman after her years of high school sports were over.

"Dang, girl, look at those." Katy said with a whistle and a squeeze. "Those are way better than mine when I started a couple years ago. You'll do well, and you'll enjoy it. The muscle is its own reward."

"Well, the prize check seems a nice reward, too. Haha." Sasha joked.

"Yeah. $1,000 is alright for a local show like this. Nothing like the men's prize, though."

Sasha wasn't surprised. Just like in everything else, the men get more for the same work. Hell, maybe less work since their bodies pack it on easier. At that time the lights dimmed and the men's portion of the show began. Sasha stayed only because Katy knew a few of the guys and wanted to cheer them on. All Sasha could think about was how she wasn't as impressed with the males as she was with the females. Sure they were bigger, but that was natural. The ladies had to really work for it. It wasn't unusual to run into a muscular man, albeit not this extreme, in your daily life. It was much rarer to see a woman like that.

Watching the lightweight men on stage Sasha had a realization. She thought that a couple of the smallest men actually looked less muscular than some of the biggest heavyweight women. Her theory was confirmed by taking a look to her right at Katy's arms and shoulders as she clapped. She easily outsized and outclassed the two or three least impressive guys on stage, and was close to a few others.

The rest of the show, Sasha was lost in her own thoughts she wanted to dive into this world head first. She was going to dedicate her life to it. She wanted to get as big as possible, not just big enough to compete with Katy, but big enough to challenge these losers who think just because they're men they have muscles to show. She was going to prove to them, the world, and herself that they were no better than her just because of her reproductive organs.

She was lost deep in her mind when she was brought to by the awards presentation. She got her focus just in time to see the overall men's winner be awarded a $10,000 check, and she started to fume. He was impressive, yes, but not nearly as much so as the women on stage, especially Katy. He was bigger than them, but he was a man, his genetics did that for him.

That was it. Her resolve had been steeled and she was ready to begin as soon as possible.
1542.title: Sasha

choices: Uh, sure but just this once
Sorry I'm busy tonight, perhaps you should find a personal trainer?
15421.content:
'Right!' Sasha thought, excited about the prospect of her bodybuilding venture. She imagined having large muscles, as big, no bigger than Katy. Sasha stood in front of her mirror and pulled a double bicep pose like she has seen the bodybuilders perform. In the mirror a fairly plain redhead girl moved her arms up to her head to reveal, well not a lot. No biceps popped up, no throbbing veins...

'Off I go!' thought Sasha, grabbing her car keys and heading out to her first gym session.

After storing her belongings in a locker, Sasha headed out with a towel, drink bottle and workout from Katy.

The first exercise was leg press. After asking a few people, she found the machine and looked dubiously at it. How did you even use this thing?

Sasha spotted a fit looking guy who was filling his water bottle and asked him to show her what to do.

Sasha worked out what to do and then began following the routine Katy had written for her.

After her session she went off to the changing room to have a shower. The mirror showed no changes to her body, but it was only one session so surely by next week she would be growing muscle right?

The routine called for Sasha to be at the gym three times a week and to do some form of cardio twice a week.

Over the course of the next month Sasha religiously followed the routine.

By the end of that month, Sasha was feeling disappointed, she had put in a lot of effort and according to the tape measure her arms and legs had not grown but shrunk! About a quarter of an inch off her arms and an inch off her legs. The only good news was her belly had lost an inch.

During the following month Sasha felt brave enough to talk to Katy a bit more. "I've been following your routine Katy" Sasha began, "but I'm hardly any different!" she finished.
Katy looked at Sasha, "Well, you are looking more toned for sure" she said. "What were you hoping for?"
"I want to be big, at least as big as you Katy" said Sasha
"Wanting to be big is one thing, how bad do you want it?" asked Katy
"Really bad" replied Sasha
"I can help you but you have to be prepared to work hard. Not just hard but over the edge of pain and into another threshold of agony." said Katy
"I can do it" said Sasha in a solemn tone.
"Let me show you what I mean" said Katy. "How heavy are you?"
"Um, 142lbs" Sasha said turning red, embarrassed. Actually she was closer to 150lbs but she really didn't want to admit that.
"I can military press 200lbs" said Katy, "for about four reps. So I should be able to press you for maybe eight?"

With that Katy swooped down and picked up Sasha, "Keep your body straight" she ordered and settled Sasha across her broad shoulders. Sasha could feel the hard cords of muscle moving under Katy's top and tried to keep still and straight.

"Observe" said Katy and began to press Sasha up into the air, before lower her friend down in front of her face and then pressing back up again.
"1, 2, 3.., 4...., 5...." Katy counted, it was getting harder.
"6.......getting harder" she said
"7......8....." phew thought Sasha this is impressive.
"9....." continued Katy, she was puffing hard, her face red with effort. Yet she wasn't stopping.
"10" Katy said, her arms trembling as she pressed Sasha into the air.
A pause at the bottom of the movement and she went to press again.
Katy's arms were quivering, "That's enough now" said Sasha
"UP!" shouted Katy and pressed Sasha into the air.
Down she went again, "RAAWWWRR" Katy was trying to press Sasha up again. Three times she attempted but each time she couldn't get passed a sticking point.
Exhausted she put her friend down.
"That's.....Intensity" she panted.

'Wow, I've been doing it wrong' thought Sasha. "I can do that" she said matter of factly. "I'll start today!" she said.
"Would you be able to train me tonight?" Sasha asked Katy.

Katy said

choices: "But you'll have to step it up to catch me!"  Katy was getting huge!
"You've almost caught up to me!"  Sasha was easily gaining on Katy.
15423.content:
Katy hadn't been kidding when she said Sasha would do well. The last month had been a blur of weight gain, both for Sasha and the weights she was lifting with Katy. Starting the very next day after the competition, she changed her diet to take in 15,000 calories per day and spent every moment she wasn't eating, sleeping, or working, in the gym. The result was growing strength and a growing Sasha.

She had already been pretty strong for someone that had never lifted, but her gains were impressive. Looking down at her one month checklist, she couldn't help but smile.

Day 1 - Day 30
Body Weight: 130 lbs - 190 lbs
Bench: 125 lbs - 195 lbs
Squat: 170 lbs - 270 lbs
Deadlift: 220 lbs - 330 lbs
Barbell Curl: 40 lbs - 70 lbs
----------------------------
Biceps: 11" - 15"
Calves: 13" - 17"
Thighs: 23" - 29"
Waist: 28" - 34"

Sasha was growing and she was growing fast. She didn't look like Katy or the other girls on stage, yet, because the high calories were adding fat as well as muscle. She knew the muscle was under there, though, and now she lived and breathed only to nurture it. As pleased as she was with her progress, she wanted more and she wanted it faster.

As usual, her post-lifting shower was spent mostly flexing and feeling her own body. There were only a few women in her gym that could outlift her new magnificent body, and she was proud of that. However, it was the men that she was outlifting now, more each day it seemed, that really turned her on.

Her thoughts drifted to a guy she had benched next to just today, Dave, she thought his name was. Her first day alone in the gym, after a week of lifting with Katy, he had offered to help unload his bench so she could use it. A nice enough gesture, but Sasha saw it as an accusation of weakness. She declined and stripped just 20 lbs off of his 155 to bring it to 135. Concerned, but clearly interested, Dave stepped up to spot her and warned her that was a lot for a girl. Having given her the worst possible insult he could have uttered, Sasha stared a hole into his face until he backed off, watching from several feet away. A distance he hoped was not insulting, but still close enough for when he needed to help.

Sasha ran her hands through her dyed-pink pixie cut hair and smoothly laid down on the bench. After expertly finding her grip, she proceeded to do a full set of 12 with the 135 lbs. She started to rack the bar, but decided to give him a show, repping out 28 more for a total of 40 before setting the bar back on it's shelf.

Dave was a regular member of the gym, so he no doubt had witnessed Sasha's improvement. Weightlifting to him, though was a hobby, not an obsession. Today being her 30th day lifting, Sasha wanted to test her new strengths. And unfortunately for Dave, it was his chest day. Sasha stood back and watched Dave do his first set with 155. After that, he added 10 for a second set, then another 10 for his third, which he struggled and cheated through. During his third set, Sasha loaded the bench next to him up to 190 and timed it perfectly for him to see her unrack as he was sitting up. She wanted to see this man witness the power of the true stronger sex as she dropped the weight to her chest and used all of her strength for a smoother lift with more weight than he could manage.

After her sensual shower, Sasha exited into the locker room commons wearing naught but a towel. She never missed an opportunity to admire what the female body was capable of, what she was making hers into. Finding a full-length mirror, she unashamedly dropped the towel and flexed her meaty double biceps.

Suddenly Kay appeared behind her in the mirror, flexing her own divine arms. "God, you're looking good..."
15423.title: Muscle comes easy to Sasha

choices: Bulk up even more to compete with the heavyweights.
154232.content:
As Katy slid in behind her reflection, Sasha's heart began to beat faster. While Sasha was in full-on bulk mode, Katy was still pretty trim for competition season. Even so, her young coworker's arms still had her topped by several inches, peaking at 18 shredded inches. She was amazed at Katy's form, showing off what the female body was capable of. Even though she had only been lifting for a couple of years, Katy was easily the most muscular person, not just woman, in their gym.

More exciting than Katy's female dominance however, was Sasha's own growth. After just a month, she had closed the gap with the young woman that inspired her. A gap that she intended to completely close, and then some.

"Not quite," Sasha said with a smile pumping her soft, but still impressive, arms a couple of more times. "But I'll be there soon."

"I have no doubt you will. Hey, sorry our shifts haven't lined up to where I could train with you very much. You don't look like you're any worse for it, though." Katy gently grabbed and squeezed at the the mounds of Sasha's biceps. "It's crazy you're doing this on your own."

Being admired did nothing but stoke Sasha's flames hotter. "What can I say? I'm very self-motivated."

One Month Later

Once again, Katy was right. What Sasha was accomplishing was truly crazy. Whereas most people's gains slow down after their initial success, Sasha's only increased. Somehow, even with her high-caloric diet, the fat was starting to give way to show hard defined muscle.

Her meteoric rise had earned her something of a following from the other women at Fittie's Gym. Fittie's was more of a place for casual fitness, especially among the women. Bodybuilders such as Katy, and now Sasha as well, were unheard of in these walls. The fact that Sasha had gone from average to amazon in just a couple of months had gotten everyone's attention. Sasha's influence was having an unforeseen side effect that she couldn't be happier with. The women of Fittie's were less afraid of working their muscles. The ladies were leaving the treadmills behind for the free weights.

Of course none had the gains that Sasha had, at least not yet, so she was still seen as something of an icon. At the moment one of her admirers was finishing taking her monthly measurements. Sasha flexed her calf for the woman and watched happily as her eyes practically fell from her head.

"Thanks, Clara. It's so much easier to get these with help."

"Any time, Sash'. You're such an inspiration, I'm happy just to help." Sasha saw a lot of potential in Clara. She was a 40-something mother of three, so she didn't have tons of time to spend in the gym, but her body had taken to weight training like a fish to water.

Clara handed Sasha her notebook and headed off to start her own session.

Day 30 - Day 60
Body Weight: 190 lbs - 205 lbs
Bench: 195 lbs - 275 lbs
Squat: 270 lbs - 400 lbs
Deadlift: 330 lbs - 475 lbs
Barbell Curl: 70 lbs - 110 lbs
-------------------------------------------
Biceps: 15" - 19.5"
Calves: 17" - 21"
Thighs: 29" - 32"
Waist: 34" - 35"

With a smirk she realized she had passed Katy as the most muscular person in the gym, and he thoughts drifted to stepping on stage with Katy at a bodybuilding show.

"I'd easily be the biggest girl up there." A few glances at the mirror changed her mind I look fucking great, but I'm probably too soft. But if I lose the size, what's the point? Her idea came back to her like a rocket. I don't need to lose any size, I'll just refine it. I can compete with the men. Hell, I'm already bigger than some of those pathetic lightweight shrimps. With a smile another awe-inspiring flex that brought the gym to a grinding halt, she had her mission.
154232.title: "You've almost caught up to me!"

15431.content:
Amanda Jennings had always liked muscle and lots of it. All throughout highschool,she had only dated the biggest,most buff athletes she could find. Being the stereotypical "hot blonde", this was easy for her but things changed when she caught a glimpse of a Female Bodybuilder in her boyfriend's sports magazine. To see a woman that buff and powerful looking stirred something in Amanda that she never knew existed. She was no lesbian,that much she knew but the sight of a beautiful woman flexing massive twenty-inch biceps was inspiring! Amanda knew then and there that she wanted to be muscular herself and even more so than that FBB.

For several years however, she kept this a secret. While not completely objected to,the idea of muscular women was not widely accepted by society in general. Most of her boyfriend referred to such women as freakshows and the boys that appreciated them were considered a minority,far outside Amanda's social circle.

In collage, Amanda attempted to take slow steps towards her goal. She became a jock and participated in as many sports as she could but most did not call for much time in the weight room and only gained her a toned,athletic build. She almost considered trying out for football but peer pressure did it's job and kept her in a cheerleader uniform.

A few years down the road, Amanda turned twenty-five and decided enough was enough. She was single,financially secure thanks to her well paying stock broker job, and had only time on her hands to accomplish her dream. She vowed to become the biggest,most muscular woman on earth and no one would stop her! She spent all of her free time in her home gym,pumping iron and consuming the safest steroids she could find but she simply couldn't bulk up and remained simply toned. One day,after a grueling benchpress session,she saw something that changed her life.
15431.title: Amanda's dream

choices: Amanda runs off excitedly to order it!
154311.content:
"Graah!" Amanda yelled as she racked a new personal best. Looking up at the 185-pound bar she smiled. That was a hell of a lot of weight for a girl her size to move, especially since she had only been lifting seriously for just shy of six months. She sat up and flexed a discreet most muscular flex in the mirror across from her and her smile disappeared.

She was insanely gorgeous, she had to admit, easily the most attractive woman in the gym, but she just couldn't get bigger. Sure she was a little more ripped, sure. Her abs showed just a little more and she was starting to see a vein on her shoulder, but she wanted mass and lots of it.

Amanda found herself looking around the room while she gathered her breath after her lift. She thought she could compare herself to the other gym-goers to lift her spirits. After all, huge or not, she was a goddess next to this bunch. It was 6 o'clock and the after-work crowd had started to pack the house. This wasn't a hardcore gym at all and that dispirited her a bit. She wished she could surround herself with the biggest and most ripped lifters in town, but this gym was literally next door to her apartment and $5 per month. That was too convenient to pass up.

She was beginning to feel better when her eyes settled on the bench next to her and the girl using it. Hannah was bench pressing 135 lbs. That sort of superiority would have made her incredibly happy if Hannah hadn't been getting the gains that Amanda wanted to the core of her soul. Hannah had joined the gym at the same time as Amanda. Literally. They signed the papers at the same time and had their gym orientation together. They had spoken a few times since then, but not often. They didn't have a lot in common. Amanda was a smoking hot successful stock broker in her mid-twenties, while Hannah was an 18 year old cheerleader recovering from a bout of anorexia.

During their short conversation on that first day, Hannah had gushed to Amanda about how great she looked. Now, however, Amanda found the tables turned. Sure, she was still more beautiful facially, and she out-boobed her D to B, but Hannah was getting the one thing that Amanda wanted more than anything. Gains.

In the last six months of pounding weights 2 hours per day, 5 days per week while using every supplement legally obtainable Amanda had been getting much stronger, she's added 90 lbs to her bench press after all. But she's only gained about 5 lbs of muscle to show for it. She's not even sure how that's possible. Hannah on the other hand has gone from struggling with the 45-pound bar to repping out triple of that, and she got the body to show for it. Hannah has improved her body from a sickly 88-pound skeleton to a shredded and curvy 140 (15 lbs more than Amanda) just by eating a little more and working out for 3 hours per week. This girl was a prodigy.

"Have you struggled with your weight your whole life?" Amanda heard a woman's voice come from the crappy CRT tv hanging over the mirror. "Have you joined every gym in town, popped every 'Miracle' pill you've heard of and just can't get the body you want? Well, we've got the system just for you." Amanda rolled her eyes. Another fad exercise program to take advantage of people looking to lose a few, she thought to herself. That is until she looked up.

The woman on the screen was perfect, or at least Amanda thought so through the terrible picture. Short red hair framed a cute face that sat atop a veritable wall of muscle. They had her attention.

"You've heard people say it: strong is the new sexy." Damn straight, Amanda thought. "Why shrink yourself down to nothing when you could look like this?" The spokeswoman flexed an arm that would look at home on any female bodybuilder. "Before using the Femiflex program, I was barely strong enough to get through the day. Believe it or not, that was just a year ago." The screen showed a comparison shot with the model and her "before" shot, which didn't look unlike Hannah when she started.

"You won't see any examples of our system in this commercial, because it's super simple. If we showed you any, we'd have no reason to sell the DVDs, but we guarantee results. If you aren't happy with your body, we'll refund the full purchase price AND pay for a year's gym membership."

1543112.content:
"Ha!" Amanda laughed to herself. A little louder than she wanted actually. "They won't even show you what it is. Almost had me there."

She looked down from the tv to see Hannah getting up from her bench. The teenager stood up and flexed a mind-numbingly sexy double bicep pose in the mirror. Amanda knew that it didn't make any sense to flex biceps after a bench press, but she didn't care. She was in awe. Hannah turned to see her guns from the back and noticed Amanda looking.

"Hey, Amanda!" The chipper cheerleader greeted her, "I just saw you pushing 185. That's awesome."

"Hey, thanks. It's a new one-rep max. 135 isn't bad either you know."

"I know, right! I can't believe I'm warming up with that now."

Amanda paused, stunned, not knowing what to say.

"I'm really hitting my stride and improving faster than ever before. That was my max just a month ago." Hannah continued apparently not noticing Amanda's brain melting. "Actually, I was hoping to go a little heavy today. Do you mind spotting me?"

As jealous as she was of this teenage phenom, she couldn't pass up this opportunity.

They each added 10 lbs to a side and Hannah slid under and pushed out nine smooth reps. Amanda didn't even need to reach to the bar let alone touch it. The tenth rep required more effort, but was never really in doubt.

Hannah stood up grinning ear to ear "I never thought I'd be this strong, Amanda. You've really been an inspiration to me. Watching you be so strong and so beautiful has been the driving force behind me beating my anorexia" The beginnings of a tear started to form in the corner of her eye.

Amanda was touched, which is an awkward mix with jealousy. Amanda reached up to touch the girl's impressively pumped shoulder, "I didn't know you felt that way. But you have done good work. That's all you." With that, Amanda gave her a curt smile and started to turn to walk away.

"Hey, you never unloaded your bar from earlier. Maybe I should give that a shot."

Before Amanda could get out a word of caution, Hannah was already under the bar finding her grip. Not wanting her unknown protege to kill herself she reluctantly stepped in to spot. Hannah found her hold, looked up and smiled, then her face went into a completely serious focus. Amanda helped her unrack and steady it before pulling her hands away. The bar lowered slowly to her chest and Hannah closed her eyes.

"Mmmmm..." Hannah let out a moan/growl that Amanda didn't find completely unsexual. The bar rose slowly but steadily, almost sticking 3/4 of the way up.

But it didn't stick. Before Amanda could react to help, the high school senior powered through the trouble spot and completed the rep. She had done it. They were officially equals strength-wise. Amanda was experiencing some seriously conflicted feelings: jealousy, pride, anger, impressed... lust? All of these feelings were fighting for space in her head. Hannah jumped up and again went into flexing her arms. Maybe she hadn't noticed before, but this teen powerhouse was seriously cut. She didn't just have the mass that Amanda craved she was actually more defined, too. Hannah pumped the flex again and Amanda couldn't tear her eyes away.

"Do you know how big your arms are?" Amanda hadn't meant to ask out loud, but it had just come out.

"Last time I measured, they were 13.5 inches, but that was a couple of weeks ago. I can tell they've gained a lot since then."

That was more than an inch bigger than her own, Amanda realized, and it's not even an updated stat.

Hannah turned toward Amanda and went into a crab flex staring into her mentor's eyes and grinning as wide as possible. Amanda couldn't meet her gaze, though. Her eyes were locked on the girl's unbelievable chest, shoulders, and arms.

"Look at us!" Hannah shrieked. "Two buff chicks lifting the gym! We're amazing! Thank you so much!" With that the raven-haired cheerleader jumped over to the previously stronger beauty and wrapped her arms around her firmly, but not too tight. Just as Amanda started to get comfortable with the hug she found herself lifted from the ground. "Can you believe it? In a few more months we're going to OWN this place!"

In this moment, Amanda feels...

15431121.content:
After a quick hug and smile, Amanda was driving home, and she was fuming. She busted her ass every day and this little punk catches up with her as if it were easy. The worst thing was that it WAS easy for Hannah.

Now at home, Amanda was standing in the bathroom posing in in the mirror, hoping to make herself feel better. She knew that most women would kill to have her body, but it wasn't enough. Her biceps were peaked, but Hannah's were bigger. Her shoulders were strong, but Hannah's were wider. She had a six pack, but Hannah's abs were more ripped than she could hope for.

She crawled into bed dejected, resigning to spend the evening watching tv to distract herself. As she flipped it on the same infomercial was on with the gorgeous bodybuilder. Amanda was straight as an arrow, but if she wasn't depressed at the moment she would have acted on some primal urges every time this woman graced her television screen. As the commercial came to an end, she had had enough and she was desperate. She scooped up her cell phone and dialed the number on the screen

Five Weeks Later

Amanda had intentionally adjusted her workout schedule to avoid Hannah. She couldn't stand to see her dream be realized faster by someone who didn't work as hard as herself. So she wandered into Fittie's gym at 11 PM hoping to find the usual sparse crowd. She was almost as lucky as there was only one person occupying the gym floor an hour before close. Unfortunately, that someone was Hannah.

While Amanda's training had suffered from her erratic new workout schedule, Hannah's clearly had not. Even from across the room, it was clear her growth had only sped up. She was standing doing alternating bicep curls with absolutely perfect form. She didn't so much as sway an inch. As Amanda lurked closer her heart sank further. The bulging teen was doing this effortless exercise with 45 lb dumbbells, making her arms surge to what AManda guessed was 16 inches.

Completely crushed, Amanda sneaked out of the gym to just give up and head home. On her doorstep she found something she had forgotten all about: The Femiflex DVDs she had ordered more than a month ago.

A note on top read:
"Hey, this showed up at my apartment sometime in the last month while I was out of town. My house-sitter brought it in and I just now found it. Sorry to have held on to it for so long!
Sincerely,
Jeff, 6-B"

Amanda sighed for a couple of reasons. First, she had forgotten about ordering this and now was doubting it even worked. Second, she though about her neighbor, Jeff. He was a personal trainer at a hardcore bodybuilding gym and had the body to show for it. She'd do anything to be able to slip across the hall and "thank him personally" for the package, but she didn't seem to fit his type as much as she would like to. Every time she saw Jeff bring a conquest home, it was a girl almost as big and jacked as him. Yet another goal she would never achieve at her current rate of growth.

She sauntered into her unit and tossed the box onto the coffee table intending to leave it for later, if she used it at all. Dropping down on the couch she closed her eyes to relax and wallow in her misery. In the near silence she could hear a sound coming from the wall that she shared with her hunk of a neighbor. The sound was the rhythmic pounding that could only be one thing. The sound brought images to Amanda's mind of the stud naked, then of him making powerful love to a beautiful woman with an impressive musculature. This was getting her excited and as she was about to act on her vivid daydream she realized the goddess in her mid was none other than Hannah. The girl that tormented her in reality now haunted her mind. No matter how hard she tried, she couldn't push the cheerleader's face out of her mind. Instead, she imagined that Hannah got bigger and more ripped with every pound on the wall. This dream continued until her rival had surpassed Jeff's gargantuan form and Amanda couldn't take it anymore.

Willing to do anything now, she popped in the DVD, cranked up the volume and pressed play...

154311211.content:
After the obligatory FBI warnings and intro messages, Amanda's screen lit up with the same musclebound lady from the advertisement posing and flexing in front of a red background, clearly the product of a (not very well edited) green screen.

"Oh, jeez." Amanda muttered to herself. "This looks cheap already. Looks like I wasted my money and got my hopes up for nothing. Not sure what I expected."

"Hi, I'm Erin." The beauty on the TV interrupted Amanda's thoughts and refocused her on just how gorgeous this woman was. "Thanks for buying Femiflex! I hope you're ready to change your body and change your life!" The camera cut to a closeup of Erin's face showing that, unlike many other women that achieve this massive size, she still looked very feminine. "This program is super simple. So simple that we actually aren't even going to have you change your current diet or workout routine!"

"What?" Amanda smirked. "This really is a joke."

"I know what you're thinking. This must be a joke! I promise it's not, though. This was me just one year ago." The screen is filled with a picture of a sexy, if somewhat slim, girl on a beach wearing the smallest of bikinis. Her hands we on her hips showing off her narrow shoulders, tiny waist and pencil-thin legs. "I thought I looked good then. Little did I know how it felt to have a real body!"

The camera cut to a comparison of the photo and current Erin striking the same pose. The difference was jarring Where before she was thin enough to fit into a high school locker, now she looked strong enough to rip that locker from the wall and fold it in half. Her shoulders had grown significantly wider, and coupled with her newfound hips gave her curves that would make an hourglass blush. Her waist only appeared to have widened by a small amount. Only now it was covered with the hardest and most deeply defined abs Amanda had ever seen, male or female. Her legs were no exception. Her calves were now as big around as her thighs were before, and her thighs were thicker than her waist.

As mesmerized as Amanda was by the goddess on her TV, her skepticism alarm was buzzing. "Sure, she's hot as Hell, but there's no way this is real. The before photo must be photoshopped or way more than a year ago. It might even be a different girl for all I know. How could this happen without even changing your routine?"

Amanda had a bad habit of talking to herself.

"We can't tell you the details on how it works, we just promise that it does!" Erin said, seemingly hearing Amanda through the screen. "We just ask you to do one thing whenever you eat or exercise. Wear this necklace!"

"Ugh."

"No really it works." Erin reassured her viewers while pulling up a thin chain hanging around her neck. "Look in the box this DVD came in and you'll find your Femiflex amulet. As long as you wear it when you exercise and eat, it'll give your body what it needs to get into better shape than you ever imagined!"

After a massive smile from the massive woman, the screen faded to black and showed the same warranty as before.

"At least I'll be getting a free gym membership for the next year." Amanda stated, accepting this as a total loss. She lifted the amulet from the box to examine the trinket. On the long, thin, silver chain hung a surprisingly clear red gem surrounded with an ornately decorated silver border.

"Well, at least it's pretty." She said, still talking to herself as she slid the necklace over her head. "Why not give it a shot?"

Two Weeks Later

After having screwed up her workout schedule for over a month, the last two weeks had been thrilling for Amanda. After having the high of bench pressing 185 lbs, her erratic, and often lazy, training had made one sloppy press at 150 lbs her new max. Still a formidable weight for any woman, let alone one weighing only 130 lbs, it paled in comparison to the dreams she had for herself.

Now, after two weeks of wearing the Femiflex amulet, she stood staring at her old top mark, 185 lbs. She had done it before and the last fortnight had been the best in her time lifting. She was sure she could handle it.

Amanda slid under the bar and found her grip. She planted her feet and flattened her back on the bench, none of this arching business that powerlifters do to shorten the distance. She was going to make this count.

She found her breath and lifted the bar from the rack. The weight felt good in her hands. It felt like coming home. Like she had been here before and this is where she belonged after a long trip. She steadily lowered the bar until she could feel the cold steel against the underside of her prodigious breasts. This was her cue to push and push she did.

The resistance was intense, more so than she remembered. Had she overestimated herself? After all, she had spent five weeks slacking off, why should she have overcome that in less than half of the time? Doubt crept into her mind and she started to panic inside. The bar was incredibly heavy, but she had to keep pushing. She kept straining and pushing until the doubt was gone and her arms were straight. The emptiness left by her doubt was flooded full with confidence and against anyone else's better judgement, she let the weight down again.

This time, sure of herself and her strength, she powered through a second rep. And then miraculously a third, which expended all of her energy. She sat up victoriously and proudly. She quickly looked around the gym to see if anyone had witnessed her new personal best. Unfortunately she had the room to herself. This privacy, however, allowed her to pull off her long sleeve top leaving her heaving torso in only a gray sports bra.

She turned to the nearest mirror and gave herself a most muscular flex that brought the biggest smile of her life to her face. The veins in her shoulders that she had previously only barely been able to see had returned in force. Her pecs (the muscles, not just her impressive boobs) were larger than she had ever seen, and certainly more defined than that day she had been equalized by Hannah.

Hannah. Thinking of her reminded Amanda how she would always flex after a bench press. With that, she moved into a double biceps pose and her giant smile somehow got larger, just as her guns had. She remembered practically drooling over the teens arms, but now her peaks were unmistakably bigger than Hannah's were on that fateful day and easily as cut.

After replacing her shirt, Amanda brought the amulet up to admire it for it's good work and gave it a kiss. This little red stone was going to make her dreams come true.

Once again, our story finds its protagonist on the bench. Ever since that fateful day with Hannah, chest day, and the bench press in particular, was Amanda's favorite way to gauge her progress. She hadn't seen her teenage protege since she snuck sullenly away that night about a month ago, so she had no way to compare her physique to that of the young phenom. She could, however, compare herself to the mirror, which she gladly did.

Sitting up on the bench, the full size wall of glass showed her that she was well on her way to realizing her dreams. Amanda had been hard on herself in the past, but now she impressed even herself. She had only completed her warmup, so she didn't want to waste time flexing for her own gratification, but took a moment to admire the chest and shoulder muscles that were prominently exhibited even without provocation.

Not wanting to let herself rest too much she swiftly rose and slid a 25 lb plate to either side of the bar already holding 185. She smiled throughout the whole process thinking about that number. Just two months ago 185 lbs had been a point of pride. Now she was warming up with it and the last two weeks had her soaring through the 200s.

She laid back down and pushed a steady 10 reps reps out and racked the bar easily. She felt good today. If she wasn't alone, she would go really heavy for her next set. Without a spot, though, she'd only put another 10 lbs on.

"Wow! You want a spot for your next set?" Said a familiar voice with amazing timing. "You look so great, Amanda!"

Amanda looked up at the person standing behind her bar and saw Hannah standing over her with a giant grin. Sitting up, she was afraid to look at the younger girl. She had had some unbelievable gains the last month, but was unsure if she was ready for this. As proud as she was of her new mass, she feared that Hannah had kept growing as well.

She had to look, though. She had to compare herself to the girl. Starting at the ground she saw that Hannah was wearing long pants. This hid her definition, but the size was unmistakable. Her thighs had to be thirty inches around, and by the way the pants clung tightly to her form, they seemed to be rock hard. Looking back at her own legs, however, she realized she had no reason to be intimidated. Her own quads reached proudly over her knee, showing nothing but muscle. Her calves similarly had no fat on them and were actually wide enough to be visible from the front. Amanda was definitely bigger below the waist.

Working up the body, she could see that the girl had added a little bit of size since she saw her last, but not an unbelievable amount. Where four weeks ago she guessed that Hannah's arms were 16 inches, she could tell now that they were probably closer to 17. The biceps were cut and showed signs of sharp separation even while hanging at rest. Amanda's own arms were a little smaller, she had just measured them at 153/4" yesterday, but were every bit as defined as Hannah's.

Similarly to her legs, her torso was covered with a black t-shirt hiding her her abs and shoulders. Even so, the neckline plunged far enough down to pecs large and hard enough to make any of the men in the gym jealous. The shirt had the gym's logo across the top and it was stretched severely out of proportion by the young girl's dense chest and wide lats. Clearly tailored to hug a normal woman's curves, it fit snugly across the stomach and looked ready to burst at the shoulders and sides. Amanda began to feel her old thoughts of inferiority returning as she examined the beautiful hulk of a girl and lowered her gaze downward. In doing so she caught a glimpse of her own chest, freshly pumped from her set with 235 lbs.

Her pecs shined with sweat, emphasizing every striation on her thick chest. A trickle of sweat ran down the canyon between her enormous pecs and lead her eyes to her own colossal breasts. She had shredded most of the fat from the rest of her body, but her massive mammaries hadn't given an inch. If anything, they actually looked larger due to being held higher by the tremendous strength of her chest and back. Coupled with her intense definition, such large breasts looked fake, but they were natural and damn near perfect.

Looking back at Hannah, she could tell that other than her arms she finally outmuscled the young cheerleader. Feeling a large amount of inner joy, she decided she should probably continue the conversation.

"Hey Hannah! Yeah, a spot would be great. You look good, too. Still growing I see."

"I guess." Hannah flexed up her titanic arm and looked at it with a hint of concern. "I'm stuck just short of 17 inches on my guns. Between starting college and working here now, I don't really have the time I want to dedicate to training and nutrition."

"You work here now?" The branded T-shirt made more sense now.

"Yeah. The owner saw me in here a couple of weeks ago and assumed I was a personal trainer." She continued flexing her incredible biceps at different angles, seemingly studying it. "When I told him I was just a member, he wanted to hire me on the spot. Right now I'm working at the front desk until I can get my certification."

"Well that's awesome." Amanda said genuinely congratulating her. Now that she was retaking dominance she no longer felt any hostility toward the girl. "I'll be the first to sign up as a client."

That lit up Hannah's face like she got a puppy for Christmas. "OH MY GOD! I WOULD LOVE TO TRAIN WITH YOU! Why don't we start right now? How much do you want for your next set?"

As strange as it all was, it wasn't the miraculous effect she was hoping for. She flexed her bicep, and it bulged large and firm, impressive, but not nearly as much as she dreamed about. It looked the same as it had before the DVD went in.

She cursed herself for putting faith in such an obvious scam. Desperation made fools of people, even her. Oh well, no time to dwell on it now, she could well afford the money she wasted on the DVD, and it was worth the shot. For now, it was early, but no point in going back to bed. She was starving! She walked to the kitchen and pulled a dozen eggs out of the fridge, firing up her frying pan, feeling hungry enough to eat them all.

A giant omelette later, along with two big glasses of milk, an apple, an orange and a banana, and a handful of her usual supplements she sat at the kitchen table. She didn't know what had gotten into her, she'd never eaten like that! She knew you had to eat big to get big, but she was never willing to sacrifice her ripped physique for a pure bulking phase. Maybe it was time, desperate times and desperate measures and all that.

As she was clearing up her dishes she heard her neighbor's door close. Probably off to the gym to get in an early morning workout before his day started, she thought. Suddenly a thought popped into her head. She had been working out all alone, trying to make gains. Couldn't she do better with a trainer? He might not have been her type for a sexual relationship, though she smiled to herself thinking that not many men could say they were truly not her type. She knew she was gorgeous. But it didn't matter, maybe he'd work with her as a trainer?

She didn't hesitate, she threw open her front door and caught him on the way to his car.

"Jeff! Hey! Thanks for getting my mail."

"Amanda?" he squinted back at her with bleary eyes. "You're up early."

"Yeah, I was ... just going to go work out. You too, I guess. Hey listen. I've been trying to, you know, build myself up a little. I was wondering if you might, you know, be looking for a client."

He smiled at her, dimples punching in his cheeks. "I noticed, you've been making some pretty good gains. You ready to start taking it seriously now?"

She looked at him a little annoyed, scowling. What had she been doing for the last six months if it wasn't taking it seriously? "What do you mean?"

"Come on, I mean you are doing great, but you go to that backwater gym. You train hard, I can tell, probably too hard. You need to recover. How much do you sleep a night? Like 5 hours? And your diet. You know you gotta eat to make gains girl! You're too worried about staying lean, keeping those sexy abs. Work with me and you might lose them for a while, but when they come back they're going to be JACKED!"

She felt her knees grow weak as he was talking. Yeah. That would work. Just the thought of working out with this adonis and transforming her physique into something huge and ripped and gorgeous was making her wet. She cleared her throat and responded.

"Yeah. That's what I want. Let's go. I mean... if you want to work with me."
154311212.title: The DVD is a scam.

1543112121.content:
He smiled at her, showing just a hint of the sadistic side she'd come to know soon enough.

"Absolutely, if you're serious. I don't work with people who aren't into it 110 percent. So, like I asked before, are you ready to get serious? Because it's going to hurt, and it's going to suck and you're going to lose friends and alienate family and maybe even your job. People are going to think you've gone crazy and, if you're serious, you won't care because every time someone stares at you like you're some kind of freak, it's going to turn you on somewhere deep inside. You ready for that? Cause if not, don't waste my time."

She only nodded, her heart pounding in her ears in excitement.

"OK, quit your gym. Or don't I don't give a shit, but you're working out at IronWorks with me from now on. No time like the present, meet me there in fifteen minutes. And maybe you want to call in to work. I don't think you'll be making it in today."

He turned around and walked away from her, not looking back. She'd show up if she wanted it. If not, no reason to waste his time.

He didn't have to wait long to find out if she was in. She pulled into the parking lot as he was getting out of his car.

"Let's do this. Hurt me, big guy. I can take it." she smiled sexily at him and walked into the gym on his heels.

Jeff wasn't one to back down from a challenge. He put her through a brutal workout, full body exercises, heavy weights, super high intensity. She had enough of a foundation from her own working out that she could take what he was dishing out, but he still made her throw up twice. She didn't seem to mind, the more he made her hurt, the more she seemed to like it. In her mind the pain was being transformed into an intense feeling of pleasure, the harder she pushed herself the more orgasmic she felt. It was the most intense feeling she'd had in her life.

She lay on the ground, panting trying to catch her breath after a heavy set of deadlifts. She was barely conscious, her vision collapsed down to a long tunnel. He leaned over her and pushed his hair back.

"OK sweetie, not bad for a girl. I got other people to train, so catch your breath, clean up your puke and be back here tomorrow at six ready for a real workout. We'll talk about your diet then, but in the mean time, eat anything that doesn't move, ok? Now get out of here!"

Three months later

"Graah!" Amanda yelled as she racked a new personal best. Looking up at the 225-pound bar she smiled.

"That's eight at 225, not bad for a few months work." Jeff her trainer said, looking down on her.

"235 next workout baby, bank on it!" she called back to him, a slight smile on her face. She sat up and flexed a most muscular flex in the mirror across from her her smile widened. No question she was bulking up now. A deep furrow of muscular cleavage ran down between her pecs which were swollen and pumped from the effort, pushing her magnificent breasts against the front of the spandex workout top. Now that she was eating right and training smarter, she was seeing good gains. Jeff had her on a clean bulking diet, so she hadn't gained too much soft weight, she wasn't as ripped as she had been, but still had a clearly visible six-pack. She'd put on 20 pounds in the last three months though, and Jeff thought at least half of it must be muscle. She'd take a little softness for those kinds of gains, especially when it would be easy enough to cut the extra weight to make her muscles really pop. When she was done growing. And she wasn't even close to being done growing.

She wondered what her old rival Hannah would think of her now. Now that she was really starting to show progress. She hadn't been back to Fittie's gym since she started working out with Jeff at IronWorks, and hadn't seen Hannah. She had toyed with the idea of showing up back there, to show off her progress, but a little nagging voice in the back of her head asked her, what if Hannah has progressed even further? She couldn't have, Amanda knew that, it wasn't possible to put on muscle much faster than she was working with Jeff. But ... what if Hannah could?

She was surprised to hear a familiar voice knock her out of her daydream. Hannah's voice. It confused her at first, she thought it was her imagination, but no, that was Hannah speaking. Coming from right behind her.

"Amanda?? Oh my god, you look amazing!"

Slowly she turned to face her teen-aged rival and saw.

15431121212.content:
"You look so great!" Hannah shrieked. Her high-pitched, girly voice did not match the hulking, but undeniably feminine, body that it came from. "Are you training with Jeff, too? My session starts in a few minutes. I just got here a bit early to warm up, I didn't expect to see my hero here!"

"Uh. Yeah. He's my neighbor. He's helping me out." Her hero? Amanda couldn't wrap her head around that. Hannah had passed her up and then some. While Amanda could pass for a light bodybuilder, and a good one, the younger girl was well into heavyweight range. Where Amanda was a little softer with her growth, Hannah was more ripped than ever. Miraculously none of the weight came from her chest, keeping her form unimaginably sexy. The young goddess stood before her in nothing but a sports bra and shorts tight enough to look painted on. IronWorks was filled with massive people of both genders, but Hannah was the biggest woman. Honestly, she was nearing her trainer's size.

"Your neighbor, really? That's awesome!"

"How did you meet Jeff? How did you end up at this gym?" Amanda was incredulous. She thought she had a secret weapon to catch up to the girl.

"Well, I was down at the beach with some of my cheerleading friends. Jeff saw us down there and struck up a conversation. He wanted to know where we trained, saying you don't see three fit girls all together that often. Next thing you know, we're all his clients. He's THE BEST trainer. And I'm his... you know..."

"What?"

"Well, I guess I'm his girlfriend." Hannah said smiling a mile wide. "Like, he hasn't used the word yet, but I spend a lot of time at his place if you know what I mean."

As dumbfounded as Amanda was, it just got worse. Why wouldn't Jeff be into this girl? She's growing faster than any human should and still looks like a woman to boot. Hell, Amanda found herself mentally drooling over her, and she was straight as an arrow.

"Here he comes. I can't wait for our workout!" Hannah couldn't stop smiling.

"What do you mean 'our' workout?" Amanda asked.

"Tonya and Stacy are here with me. We always lift together. They were just changing."

Amanda looked over at Jeff, hoping that he'd soon be back to pull the supergirl away so that she could go run off and cry. Unfortunately he got caught by his boss and pulled into her office. "Well, I should probably leave you girls to your workout then." She said, hoping to get herself out.

If these girls had only been going for a couple of months, then Jeff really must be THE BEST trainer. Easily the tallest woman in the room, her height was hardly her only interesting feature.
