1543112121221.content:
Amanda stood slack jawed staring at the trio of teen-aged amazons parading before her. This just wasn't possible! It couldn't be happening! Now that she had decided to get serious about her training, she had seen the effects of Jeff's methods, but Hannah's results were unbelievable! And her friends weren't far behind.

She wanted to slink away, to hide out from the girls, but no! Something in her subconscious cried out, no! This is what you want! If you run off you will never learn how they did it. Work with them, learn from them, and then you can be like them.

"He... Hello girls. I'm pleased to meet you both." She put out a hand for each to shake, squeezing firmly. Neither seemed to notice the pressure, and Tonya squeezed back hard enough that Amanda had to try not to wince.

"Are you benching, Amanda?" Tonya asked in a sweet voice. "We're working chest today with Jeff, do you mind if we work in with you?"

"Of course doesn't!" she heard a woman's voice call out across the gym. Amanda turned to the voice and stared at the woman, stunned. It was the red-head from her DVD! Walking across the gym floor with Jeff. She was covered in a sweater and loose pants, but Amanda could tell she was massive. Far bigger than she had been even when Amanda had seen her on screen. She realized that although Jeff had mentioned his boss many times, she had never seen her. Could this gigantic red-head be her?

"Why don't you ladies show Amanda what you can do?" Jeff suggested. "There's 225 on the bar, Tanya, Hannah, that's a good warmup weight for you. Stacy, you should probably do push-ups to warm up, you don't want to pull anything."

The girls proceeded to put on a bench press demonstration. Tanya and Hannah each cranked out 15 effortless reps with Amanda's max weight, while Stacy dropped to the ground and performed endless push ups with her body straight and solid as a board and showing no strain at all. Amanda hoped the push ups indicated that the tall blonde was closer to her level in strength, but it was not to be. When it was the tall blonde's turn to bench and she pumped out 12 easy reps at 225, barely slowing on the last one. The teens added a third plate to the bar, taking the weight to 315. This was starting to reach Stacy's limit, and she was able to 'only' perform four clean reps at that weight. The other two women were just getting started, pressing 400, then 500 pounds. The bar bent and groaned under the colossal weight as teenaged, feminine muscle forced massive iron to shift and move.

Tanya was ecstatic at lifting 500 for 5 reps, jumping up and yelping, "Time to move up! I'm beating you today, bitch! I got this!" at Hannah. They set the bar at 550 pounds and she strained with everything she had to get the bar up once, slamming it into the pins with a titanic crash of iron, shaking the gym floor.

"Yes! That's your record Hannah! I got you!"

Hannah just smiled and lay down on the bench saying, "Put 25 on each side." She cranked out two reps at 600 pounds, the last one shaky but manageable.

She sat up on the bench as Stacy and Tanya looked on in admiration and awe. She giggled and stuck her tongue out at her rival, looking for a moment like an eighteen year old girl, rather than a massively muscular powerhouse. That impression ended when she flexed her mighty pecs. Thick slabs of muscle swelled in her chest, dancing and popping as they inflated larger and larger.

"You gotta work a little harder if you wanna catch the queen, Tonya!" She flexed her pecs one side at a time, making her small but firm breasts bounce in rhythm, giggling again.

"Next week, bank on it!" Tanya called back, making her much, much larger breasts dance the same way, almost losing her top as she did.

"Ladies!" the redhead interjected. "Rivalry is all good, of course, but let's not get too carried away, alright?" She turned to Amanda and asked, "So? What do you think of our girls?"

Amanda was having a little trouble thinking after the ridiculous show of strength and muscle that just went on in front of her. She was overwhelmed with feelings of jealousy, envy, desire and lust. Her brain was barely functioning. How? How could these girls be doing this? She had to know!

"I'm speechless," she found herself saying, "And awestruck."

"Of course you are. You're one of us. You just haven't been given all the tools yet. But I suppose we should check first, to be sure. Ladies? What is your mission?"

Suddenly all the women responded to her in unison, their voices almost mechanical. Amanda was shocked to discover that she was responding with them.

"Build our bodies up. Bigger is better! No limits!"

"Excellent. Amanda, I'm Diana. Would you like to have a word in my office, while Jeff takes his young trainees through their paces?"

She followed the huge red-head across the gym into her private room and stood silently as she closed the door behind her. Immediately the noises of a crowded gym were cut off and she was submerged in an ocean of silence.

"You must have questions. But really, there's only one, isn't there?"

The red-headed woman pulled her sweat pants down and Amanda audibly gasped. Her legs were massive, bigger than anything she had ever seen, twice the size they were in the video. Ripped, rock-hard muscle bulged from every inch of them, and a network of fat, jagged veins criss-crossed across the surface, covering them like a warped fish-net. Huge hunks of muscle burst from her calves, small boulders of power jutting out below her knees.

It barely seemed possible, but her upper body was even more outrageously over-developed than her legs. She would have been considered out of balance, her legs overshadowed, in a formal competition. Massive deltoids jutted out from her bull neck, and gigantic arms thicker around than Amanda's legs draped down from her colossal shoulders, pushed out from her body at a steep angle by overdeveloped lats and the impressive thickness of her arms themselves. Her breasts were non-existent, but fat nipples poked out through the thin fabric of the bra.

She knew this was too far, it was too much. She wasn't aesthetic, she wasn't feminine, she was just a mountain of overdeveloped muscle. And Amanda wanted her so badly she nearly came right there on the spot. She had always wanted to have it all, preserve her fabulous good looks and still build thick slabs of muscle, but now, looking at Diana, this compromise disappeared like a popping bubble. She wanted to have what Diana had, her power, her strength, her muscle. She didn't care what she would have to sacrifice to get it. If there was a pill she could take that would give her Diana's body, but cause her to die at midnight, she would have taken it without hesitation. A day as a goddess was worth more than a second rate life.

"The same question they all have, after they see the DVD, at least. How do you get this?"

She flexed a mind blowing bicep pose gigantic muscles writhing and dancing as she moved, and Amanda almost lost consciousness.

"Well, let's start at the beginning. My name is Diana Gardner, and I'm anorexic. Well, recovering, you might say. I put together a program to help anorexics like myself and your friend Hannah. Rather than try to break our urge to control all aspects of our life and development, we replaced our overpowering desire to starve ourselves with an overpowering desire to build muscle. It was a massive success."

She giggled a little at the pun, her voice deep and gravely.

"I was the first guinea pig, you might say. I was smart, but I didn't know about bodybuilding, or nutrition. Or drugs. Some would say I went a little overboard. I meet Jeff and learned so much. And so, we applied it all to generation two, Hannah, and a few other women who become so inspired by the training DVDs that they want to do whatever it takes to build muscle. We've tailored the supplements and programs to keep the women feminine, yet still building massive muscle. But not quite as big as with me. Hannah has progressed amazingly, but there's no way she's going to come this far, not without making some sacrifices with her femininity. And she'd be happy to make them, of course, but I'm not ready to let her go there just yet."

"Which brings us to you. We've put a lot of effort, along with frankly some geniuses around the world to come up with a new performance enhancing cocktail. Generation three. The best of all worlds, massive muscle growth, but with simultaneous enhancement of feminine characteristics. And it's all tied off of desire, the more you want it, the better the compound is going to work."

"We need a guinea pig for generation 3. Someone who wants this so badly. Hannah and I were anorexic, our desires are retargetted, but we never wanted to get huge before the hypnosis, so they're limited by that. Stacy and Tanya were never anorexic, they don't have the same obsession for growth. But you? You wanted this even before you saw the video. You are what we've been waiting for.

15431122.content:
She wanted to hate her. She really wanted to hate Hannah, but she just couldn't. The young woman's enthusiasm was infectious, and though Amanda desperately wanted the kinds of gains Hannah was posting, she couldn't help but feel ... what? Not happy for her, certainly, but the young woman's enthusiasm made it hard to be angry of jealous either. That left impressed and, she couldn't deny it, lust.

"You're the amazing one," she grunted in Hannah's bear hug. The teenager noticed how tightly she was squeezing her inspiration and put Amanda down, smiling bashfully.

"Thanks." she muttered, catching her breath. Amanda knew she should have just walked away, but her frustration got the better of her.

"How do you do it? When we walked in here a few months ago a strong breeze could have blown you over, now you're lifting me in a bear hug. I don't get it, you've grown so much, so fast, it's ..."

She let that thought trail off. She caught herself, composed herself again and smiled at the dark haired teen.

"I'm sorry, just venting a little. You're doing great, I just wish I had your genetics for it."

Hannah beamed a broad smile at her and asked in a low, provocative tone, "Want to know my secret?"

Amanda's heart froze in her chest. She felt herself flush red, the world felt like it started to move in slow motion, and her focus narrowed so only Hannah and herself existed. Was there really a secret? Was it something she could share? She couldn't speak, she just nodded slowly.

Hannah looked very nervous, suddenly. She looked away from Amanda, looking around first, then down at the floor, shifting her weight from foot to foot.

"Well..." she spoke hesitatingly, having a hard time getting the words out, clearly nervous. "I mean, like ... you know, maybe ... if you want we could get coffee. And talk about it. If you drink coffee, I mean! Or, you know, something else. Like I mean... juice? Or something?"

Amanda had seen this show a thousand times before, of course, usually from men. Hannah was asking her out? She felt a surge of goose bumps flow over her skin, and she shivered a little, smiled widely at Hannah and said in a smooth, seductive voice, "I like coffee. Come on, there's a Starbucks across the street."

154311221.content:
Amanda and Hannah walk across the street to the coffee shop still in their tight and revealing gym clothes, turning every head in sight. After getting their drinks, they find a table outside in the shade where they can talk.

Amanda breaks the ice. "So. HOW do you do it? I mean, I'm in the gym over ten hours per week and have gotten way stronger, but you're there for less than a third of that and are getting... well, honestly, my dream body."

"What? Stop it." Hannah said into her drink, blushing. "I mean, like, I've had some good gains, but you are so beautiful. There's no way I compare to you." She looked up into Amanda's eyes for a split second before nervously looking back at her coffee and taking a sip.

"No really. I really want to bulk up. Like, look at this." Amanda reached over and gently caressed Hannah's arm that held her cup. The arm was curled halfway to her lips showing off a sharp bicep. At Amanda's soft touch, Hannah instinctively flexed the muscle, making the peak harden further and grow another half inch or so.

"Oh, stop." Hannah verbally protested, though she made no move to physically resist the contact. Actually quite the opposite. She turned her forearm and tightened down even harder on the flex, bringing her mound to the size of a baseball, and just as hard.

"It's so hot. I would love to have arms like yours. Actually, and I've never told anyone this, I really want to be a bodybuilder." With this, Amanda withdrew her hand and flexed her own biceps. Any other woman would kill to have her arms, there was no jiggle, no excess fat. Just hard, well defined muscle, although it was significantly smaller than her new friend's, which was the problem. "Like one of the REALLY big ones. So, really. How have you managed these gains?"

Hannah's heart was pounding in her chest. She was rarely this nervous. Just earlier she was talking normally, but now that they were on this quasi-date her stomach was filled with butterflies. She wasn't a lesbian, well she didn't think so. She had only had a couple of boyfriends and had never gone all the way. Amanda was just so damn gorgeous, and something about her drive in the gym really turned Hannah on. "Well, have you heard of the Femiflex program?"

"That weird new fitness DVD they advertise on TV?"

"Yeah."

"With the super jacked lady selling it?"

"Yeah, that's Erin. She shows you how to do it. My parent's got it for me when I hit rock bottom with my anorexia. I was in the hospital and they would do anything to help me get better. I've been doing it before every workout."

"Wow. I'm sorry. I didn't know it was that bad." Amanda reached out and grabbed her hand. Making the butterflies worse.

"We could go back to my place. I could show it to you." Hannah offered meekly only slightly glancing up from her coffee.

15432221.content:
Stephanie couldn't be prouder. She had worked hard for her body and couldn't take her eyes off of herself. Turning sideways she took a good look at her luscious behind and powerful legs that were on display in her dangerously short dress and impressive heels. In her excitement to show off her sculpted new form, she had shown up to her 10 year reunion too early. She didn't have any problem, though, killing time by looking in the mirror and taking selfies. As she posed and flexed in her old high school's bathroom, she had time to remember how she got to this night.

____________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________


Stephanie Murray and Eric Wallace had been dating since sophomore year. They both had spent their freshman year being awkward loners an it had seemed inevitable that they would pair up. Both of them were quiet average-looking students. Neither attractive or ugly. No geniuses or idiots. Not popular or pariahs. They flew perfectly under the radar and they did it together. Senior year had been different, though. Eric had taken up weightlifting over the summer and Stephanie enjoyed every minute of it. He never got very muscular, but she loved watching him lift, though she never joined herself.

The longer he stuck to his routine, the more obsessed they both became. For Stephanie, she had maintained her virginity this long into the relationship, but she didn't know how much longer she could last. On Eric's part, the added confidence, more than his slight muscle gains, had lifted him from obscurity in the social circles at school.

Just when Stephanie didn't think she could take it anymore, the bomb was dropped on her. Eric stopped walking abruptly on the way home from school. They had been heading back to his house so she could ogle him while he lifted. It was chest day, her favorite. She turned to see what was wrong and he wouldn't look her in the eye.

"Steph, this is going to be hard, so I'm just going to throw it out there." He said staring at the pavement. "I'm going to the dance with Alli Thorne."

She didn't know how to react. Queen bitch Allison Thorne had spent the last 4 years ruling the school. From the moment she stepped on campus her first day she got anything, and any guy, she wanted. Her beauty and social standing had every girl wanting to be her, while her toned cheerleader's body had every guy wanting to be with her. Stephanie thought Eric was different. though.

"I'm sorry." He stated quietly as he walked past the catatonic Stephanie.

That was their last day as a couple.

The next nine years were not good to Stephanie. The break up had put her into something of a depression. As most people do, she ate her feelings and by the time she turned 27 she weighed just over 200 lbs. She had watched her weight gain aware the entire time. She wanted to do something to lose it, but she couldn't bring herself to exercise. Every gym she passed, every sport on tv, reminded her of what she loved about Eric. Unfortunately, what she had loved is what took him from her.

About a week after her birthday, she checked her mail on her way in from work. "Only two pieces today, hmm?" she said as she looked it over. The first was a flyer for a free trial membership at the new bodybuilding gym up the street. "Heh, didn't do much market research, did they?" She muttered to herself.

The second piece would change her life. It was an unmarked white envelope with just her high school logo on it. She opened it to find an invitation to a reunion. She started to laugh at the idea of going until she saw the RSVP's return address. It was to be sent to a name that was both unfamiliar and terrifying: Allison Wallace.

Tears started to well up in her eyes until she dropped the envelope, holding just the flyer. The an idea popped into her head that changed her outlook immediately. That which took her love would also bring about her retribution. Weightlifting.

The next year was a blur of sweat and iron. Stephanie cursed herself for never joining in with Eric during his sessions in high school. Her body reacted to training better than his ever had. It certainly helped that she had professional trainers and nutritionists at her disposal. Within six months she was in better shape than she hand ever been. She had shed 9 years of depression fat and weighed the same 120 as she did in senior year, only now she looked like a model instead of a wallflower.

____________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________


The next six months had brought her body to where it was now. 150 lbs of muscle and almost no body fat. She wasn't bodybuilder large, but her muscles were definitely more impressive than Eric's had been all those years ago. Her biceps were bigger with sharper peaks. Her abs, back, and chest were more ripped. To compare her legs to his would be to compare an oak to a shrub.

She took one last picture for her Instagram of her beaming face over a rear bicep flex. She couldn't stop smiling. She was happier than she had ever been. She had to leave the mirror, though, for the party was about to start and it was her time to shine.

15432222221.content:
The 100+ heat combined with the 100% humidity was a deadly combo. Julianne almost wanted to quit and just go back to the hotel but for some reason she didn't. Maybe it was the fact it was her first time out in the field in over 5 years, or maybe it was the fact that the site they were going to had not been explored yet and there was something special about being the first to put a shovel on a dig site. What ever it was that drove her the rest of her expedition did not have it. They had all decided to turn around miles ago. She thought back to how 5 months ago she argued against hiking in saying a few more months of fund raising for a helicopter would be better but she was overruled on the basis that by the time they got the funds for a chopper another group would be on the site. So now he she was all alone in the furnace blasting heat trying to make it the final 5 miles. She was no longer furious as the vegetation had started to clear out on the jungle floor and create a kind of canopy from the sun. Instead being by herself 50 miles from the nearest signs of civilization and that was putting it mildly had pat Julianne at ease with herself.

She had about 5 miles to go but she could not go on any further. Finally Julianne fell over from exhaustion. She took her pack off which weighed 55 LBS and grabbed 2 bottles of water and quickly gulped them down. With the vegetation clearing she made a decision and quickly got undressed. Before putting away her long sleeve shirt and rip resistant pants she wrung them out for 2 minutes to get some of her sweat out. She then changed in to a short sleeve tan t-shirt and a pair of black cargo shorts that came down just past her knees. She was still sweating and hot but the change of clothes felt great. She waited another 20 minutes to get her strength back. Eating a few power bars as well as part of a MRE also helped. She drank some water and used the remaining bottles of water she had to refill her camel back. Rested, recharged, but still sweating Julianne got back on her feet checked her GPS and took off again. She made it 4.5 miles through fairly tough terrain but kind jungle vegetation before she was hit by something she could not explainon. Julianne figured it was just the suns rays reflecting off of the fairly smooth rock formation she was now in. As she continued hiking to her end point the exhaustion she felt finally went away and by the time she made it to the coordinates on her GPS she felt better and more refreshed than she had in awhile. Since she was not tired anymore Julianne quickly set up her campsite and got to work. One thing that she quickly noticed about these ruins is that they did not fit a standard pattern of any known civilization from the area. She could not put her finger on it but she could she influences of several different civilizations. Just as she was deciding when to go back to the site and have dinner she saw the most peculiar pyramid. It was large and made out of black stones. "Obsidian or volcanic rock" Julianne thought as she looked at it. The pyramid itself was in a huge depression. From the guess of it she estimated the hole to be around 350 feet deep. "So this must be why we did not see anything from visual satellite photos or drone reconnaissance" Julianne mused to herself. She looked at the hole and realized it was steep. She would get her rappelling kit tommorow and go in. The size of the hole coupled with the size of the jungle trees had obscured this pyramid until now. That did excite her, Julianne the first person to see this structure in who knows how many centuries. As she walked back to her campsite though something was off. The structure of this pyramid did not seem right. It looked like a cross between an Egyptian pyramid on 3 sides and a Mayan pyramid on the other with the steps. From her knowledge she thought the closest Mayan city was 125 miles north of her position. The Egyptian's well across the ocean. It bugged her but with that she took a seat pulled out a satellite phone and called her research group HQ to let them know she was on the site.

When she let her bosses boss know she had reached the site Julianne could tell he was stoked as it was in his voice. When she asked "How did we know there was a temple here," She received some strange news. "Julianne are you sitting down?" Julianne was curious but replied "yes." Then her bosses boss went on. "About 6 months ago a huge infra red signature appeared from that area. It had not been there before and it was present for every satellite equipped with thermal imaging device for a week and then as quickly as it appeared it the IR source went away. A ground penetrating radar scan showed something was there but we could not get actual photos due to the vegetation. This is why we quickly sent an expedition out as fast as we could. Normally you would be right and we would have got funds for a helicopter but the way this site appeared was weird to say the least. Anyway I am glad at least 1 of you had the guts to man up and get out there." Julianne smiled at that last part and said "Well Sir phone is about dead I am going to put it on a solar charger and report back tomorrow." With that she hung up and tried to get some sleep but the information she had received was puzzling. She put it out of her mind and prepared for the next day when she would hopefully find the entrance to the strange pyramid.

Ellie had begun following Darren to the gym for all of his workouts. He was under the impression that she wanted to spend more time with him, but in reality she was using him as an unknowing guide to beginning in the gym. She had been following him for a month now and had come to three revelations in the past few weeks.

1. She had always considered Darren to be muscular. Now, she was very certain that he was just slightly above average. He worked out for sports, but it was becoming apparent that he was just here to keep the coaches off his back. His effort was lackluster at best and it showed. He was about the least muscular man in the school's weightroom every day, even being outclassed by a good number of the women. He would never admit it, but last week he adjusted his schedule on the fly to avoid benching next to that nerd Jackie, since she was pumping effortless reps with his maximum.

2. She loved lifting. LOVED it. Every other hobby or interest she held had been completely forgotten. On days she wasn't working out with Darren, she was researching better techniques and nutrition, running laps around the campus, or doing bodyweight exercises in her dorm.

3. Darren's laziness at the gym was a huge turnoff. In the last month he had made no progress, nor did he seem to care that he wasn't improving. Since Ellie had gotten hooked, her fitness had skyrocketed. Her natural metabolism had granted her with an enhanced physique in just these short 4 weeks. If she tensed her stomach, you could see the beginnings of a six pack. She still had her thigh gap, but her quadriceps stood out a little more and had definition that would be impressive for a track athlete. Right now she was inspecting the gains of her biceps resting over the pad of a preacher curl machine.

She no longer used the lightest weight available, and the difference was visible. Her arms were by no means huge, but when she flexed or engaged them in a lift her peaks stood out prominently. Finishing her second set at 30 lbs. Ellie reached down to lower the weight for a cooldown set. Pulling the pin she looks a few machines down at her boyfriend doing the same exercise. His form is sloppy, he's basically standing over the pad and swinging his back. His arms are thick, but show very little, if any, definition or peak. Also finishing his set, he lowers the weight to 40 lbs.

Pin still in her hand, Ellie smirks behind his back. She had planned to drop to 20 lbs. but decides to change her plans and raise it to match his 40. She sits down at the same time as him, matching his movements. His lifts are no longer as sloppy, but not as rigid as they should be. Ellie, on the other hand, has discovered a new wrinkle in her lifting obsession: challenge.

She wants to match Darren's lifts. she wants to not only match the weight but do it better. She flips her long, blonde, sweat-soaked hair from her face and tightened her grip. She sets herself and pushes hard against the handle. Expecting an enormous strain and possibly to fail, Ellie is shocked and almost loses her grip when her hands glide up to her shoulders. Her grin evolves into a full-blown smile at the realization of her strength. Holding the weight just below her chest, she glances down and sees a faint vein visible on her biceps for the first time. Exhilarated by her own power she speeds through a set of 12, finishing before Darren, and slipped off to the women's locker room.

Hurrying to a mirror, Ellie brings up her fists into a double biceps flex harder than she ever had before. Arms trembling from the force of her flex, she was amazed at her own reflection. She no longer looked out of place in the gym. She was by no means the most impressive physique around, but in 1 short month she had skipped right past fit or toned and straight into being classified as muscular.

She let her flex down and massaged the newly solid muscles in her upper arm, almost crying happy tears. Thinking back to Darren she wondered at her next move. Their workout was over, so she needed to decide how to present herself. Darren had noticed her improvements, but he had never seen her flex and since she did the same lifts at the same time, he never saw her pumped up. And she had never been pumped like this before. She was so proud of her new body and she wanted to show off for him.

However, event though he was an athlete and had lifted for years, she now looked way more in-shape than him and had just matched a lift of his. He was still a little bigger than her, but if a stranger had to guess which one was on an athletic scholarship, any sane person wold pick Ellie. How would he react to her upstaging him? Should she just throw on her jacket and hide?

He would be waiting for her by now. She had to go see him. One more flex in the mirror and she brought her sharp peak to her lips for a quick kiss before heading to her locker to gather her belongings.
